title: Terrible company, often you will not get what is advertised with in-app purchases, one email per day per issue
review: I wish we could give negative stars. Frustrating frustrating frustrating, did I mention frustrating, zero customer service.Pros:Could be fun if it worked right and you got your money 's worthCons:1. The game never works right. Also if you think you are playing for free, forget about it, this game is not fun at all unless you spend money, otherwise you are constantly losing battles. Been there tried that, not fun at all.2. 80% of the time you don't get what you paid for. Example, you buy a pack that is $99 and comes with few different types of of upgrade, lets call them A, B and C. So you paid $99 to get upgrade A, upgrade B, Upgrade C. Fantastic you are all happy now to use the upgrade and make your moves, 1 problem, for some reason when you go to apply upgrade C, you get an error. Ok contact customer service right? Read #33. Contacting customer service = you send an email for help, you immediately get a programed response saying their team is viewing your claim, then you wait 24 to 48 hours for response. When they do respond it is always the same:A. If your issues is the game giving you an error or something not working right, then you are told "programmers are aware and are working on it. (sure, I have been waiting for over a year for the programmers to fix my errors and nothing, meanwhile they have my money for the issue that is not working)B. If your issue is you didn't get the correct amount of something then they will keep incorrectly telling you that you are the one that is mistaken and you did get the correct amount,Â  even tho after the first 3 times you have learned your lesson and this time you have screen shots as proof.(see my first picture about credits, at the bottom you see link for 6 screnshots as proof, still didn't get my 3 millionÂ  credits till this day, now it is obsolete)4. One email per day. After waiting 24 to 48 hours (mostly 48 or longer) you get a response back fromÂ  customer service if you are lucky, and you respond, you now have to wait 24 hours for a response, in short your communication is limited to one email per day making every issue a week long project.5. Don't expect them to read your emails, example last week I like an idiot decided to come back to this game, paid for upgrade pack, part of it was something called "instant multiple research". What this does is allows you to upgrade bunch of categories with one click instead of literally 100s of clicks. Emailed customer service complaining about "instant multiple research" not working, 2 days later got a response saying we understand you have an issue with "alliance gifts" we are working on it. Now "alliance gifts" have nothing to do with "instant multiple research" so obviously they didn't read my email at all.That is like you call AT&T to complain about your "cellphone service" and they say: we understand you are having an issue with your" tivo box" and we are working on it.That was last week, replied to them saying their response had nothing to do with my issue, you want to know what their response is?I will let you know when they respond because 7 days and 5 emails later, I have 0 response to report to you. This is Machine Zone's idea of customer service.6. No way to contact this company other than the process above, which basically means no way of contacting this company. Mobile Strike, gods of War and a couple of other games are owned by machine zone.STAY AWAY FROM THIS GAME / COMPANY, THEIR FINE PRINT SAYS YOU HAVE NO RIGHTS AND THEY ARE NOT OBLIGATED TO HAVE THE GAME WORKING PROPERLY OR OWE YOU ANYTHING AT ALL WHETHER ITS THE GAME WORKINGÂ  CORRECTLY, YOU GETTING WHAT YOU PAID FOR IN-APP PURCHASES. CUSTOMER SATISFACTION MEANS ZERO TO THIS COMPANY, I WARNED YOU.LOOK AT ALL THE OTHER NEGATIVE REVIEWS HERE AND EVERY PLACE ELSE, ALSO GOOGLE "MOBILE STRIKE COMPLAINT".

ABSOLUTELY NOTHING....

title: Like the game somewhat
review: Like the game somewhat, however, VERY geared towards $$$$$$ players.Â  In the end, what do you actually get but an empty pocket or credit card bill.Â  You can't hope to establish a base as you're bullied by larger players levels >15 as they attack your troops on resource tile gathering missions just to get "kill" points/power.Â  Not sure how anyone expected to think beginners could fair against a larger player/s, alliances I've seen are no help either.Â  L1 troops lose against >L4 or along those lines.Â  Lower players can't really attack higher players to gain anything, only be suicide.Â  $5 pack is an OK deal, not purchased one myself but they just go up up up after that as a baiting mechanism to make you buy buy buy.Â  Been playing actively for months and never have I gotten anything significant to advance to stronger levels.Â  Larger players swarm around you waiting for your peace shield to drop so they can attack your base, with a peace shield you can't be attacked or attack someone else or scout either.Â  Material to manufacture things is none existent, you have to run so many resource tiles and combine items to barely make a weapon for your commander.Â  And, DON'T EVER occupy a resource tile >6 as that's a beacon to larger players to just kill your troops if they can't defend off the attack.

title: Greed
review: Way to expensive to play. If you want to be competitive then plan to dish out hundreds each month. Greedy company... I spent into the thousands over a period of a few months and I couldn't get close to being competitive. So... I quit and gave my account to a friend. The game is really boring unless you have hours to waste. Lot's of needless click/tap just to upgrade XP etc. When I say lots... I mean hundreds of repetitive taps over and over... I fell asleep many times doing this mundane task. So, I don't recommend this game to anyone and if I were Arnold... I would get my face off the game personally. Game has potential but greed has corrupted the company and I don't see it lasting very long without a major change in how they do business.

title: Nation Building and Military Action
review: This game was obtained for my grandson, so this review is basically made through his feedback.Â  He is seven.Â  Overall, he puts this game in the middle ranks of his gaming interest.Â  It is probably a bit too advanced for him as it is really a strategy game on civilization building and military action.Â  It is probably more suited to kids in the 8-12 age group.He tells me it is fun, and after watching him play it for a couple of hours, he was well (and quietly) entertained.Â  Be warned that it is basically a game of nation building, but it has a lot of violence embedded in the results of that nation building.

It isn't, unless you want to play Farmville within a war game. It will cost you thousands to play if you wish to be competitive! In game packs are constantly offered at $99 to $349 each. "Bouncy crates" are constantly presented to encourage you to spend so you can get the "bonus" items in the crate too. This is in-app purchasing at its absolute immoral worst and should be illegal.

title: Greedy

title: 99 for useless junk to 99
review: THe game is not free. - any base modifications beyond beginner level require purchasing packs of components, usually for at least 49.00 for the next needed parts for the next base level.The amount of marketing to sell the packs is unprecedented - you will get between 5 and 10 emails a day to entice you to purchase buy on get one half of packs that range from 9.99 for useless junk to 99.99 to 129.99 packs that have the parts you need to raise one component a level.Customer support only provides canned, pre-written replies that DO NOT deal with your concern, and do not address failings of the game operations. The standard reply includes a request for you to do a hard reset and reload of the game to restore operations.So in the middle of the war game, while vulnerable and attacking, the game will stop, and you are expected to perform a technical process that lasts 5 min or more on your phone. The net result is you have become cannon fodder for an attacking player, and you just lost the money you spent.Also, there are frequent system resets required, both because of the constant marketing updates inserted in game play, and for fixes and adjustments. Some of these resets are done in the middle of play, and you are required to log back into the game, and again, during this process the player is at risk for losing the monies you just spent.

Example, pay to play attacks with 6 troops and destroys 50k troops of non pay to play person. I'm extremly disappointed with this developer.

Upon first trying out the game, you will become addicted to the point where its like smoking. You won't be able to stop spending money as you constantly try to stay powerful. You will waste so much money on Overpriced Gold Purchases and end up losing so much money, just to get destroyed by someone who has spent more money than you. So please, heed my warning. If you want a boring game that you will spend 500$+ on, then go ahead. I DARE you to delete this game after being at HQ Level 10. You won't be able to do it. Its too addicting. Luckily, I am an Experienced Gamer who has played these types of games in the past. I was able to quit before they sucked up all of my cash. Please, just listen. You've been Warned.

title: Money Grab for Dying Company
review: Terrible game. Want to play at all? $100 a week. Want to play as a mid level leader? $300 a week. Want to lead an alliance and compete for the main events in game? $1000 a week. What do they do with all that money, you ask. To be honest, I have no idea. The game is laggy, crashes all the time both on Android and IOS. The servers they use have no way to keep up with even slightly above normal activity. The games creator, Epic War LLC is currently tied up in legal battles and this game is simply a money grab in an attempt to pay for the court costs and pad their pockets and give them a parachute for once they inevitably have to pay out a settlement. Do yourself a favor and don't play this game unless you have about $30,000 - $50,000 per year to spend on it.

title: not for whiney types who are used to winning easy games

title: This game is a fraud and a money trap, with absolutely zero customer service.
review: This game is a money trap. Players spend thousands ($10k plus in some cases) to not even be able to keep up. To make things worse, the game constantly crashes, chat doesn't load, players are kicked when in battle (causing several players to lose their entire investment in troops, to the tune of thousands of dollars), the game glitches constantly in graphics, and their customer service is unresponsive, aside from auto responders. This game is typical of the GOW - EpicWar casino mentality, get them hooked, find the whales, and soak every dime out of them possible, before abandoning the game for a new venture, repeat. These developers should be sued for this fraudulent excuse for a game.

title: Decent game idea, horrible support and deelopers
review: This game is a great game for people wanting to spend their entire paycheck to advance as fast as possible. The only way to advance is either find a group who will protect you or shield and hope you never get hit on resource tiles. The server for this game is overly unpredictable, it will be great and everything moves at lightening speed or it will bog down and take forever to load the game and use items. Items used go fast, when the servers are having problems you are apt to lose many of these cash items and game won items. If the app crashes and you lose items or army or anything else for that matter, the developers give you a such minute portion of what you need to rebuild and their attempts to rectify any problems with the game are then turned on you and your internet speed or your device. They take no responsibility for the issues of their own game and servers, yet these drones just keep paying them thousands of dollars to play a halfway broken game. Pass this one up people the frustration will only leave you with a broken otter box and a cracked screen on your phone.

title: This game is broken and basically abandoned due to the intellectual ineptness of its developers.
review: This game is a scam.Â  I thoroughly enjoyed it in the beginning, but now this is not the product I have been funding at all.Â  They are placing far too much product in at one time, the game is entirely unbalanced, and before you think that perhaps this is just a rant of an individual that is tired of paying to play, even that functionality does not work properly.Â  The packs you purchase either via Google, Amazon, or iTunes do not go through half the time making it time out on the challenges, then not to mention the items you receive are pretty much pointless as the coding in this game is so entirely in disarray that the number does not even line up with your attacks.Â  This game is completely broken now, and I will not be playing, paying, or continuing with any of this nonsense any longer.Â  Seeking refund as I state prior this is not the game that we all began to play, and now it is a broken mess being allowed to be downloaded by the afore mention providers.

title: False Advertising, Greed, Double Talk
review: Once you get to a certain level in this fame, you can't go any further without spending real money. They market gear at the strongest, but you can only obtain it by buying "packs" which is a gold purchase, but the gold is worthless. You only buy the pack for the gear so you can compete with other bases without getting crushed, because you KNOW they've purchase the latest gear. So you drop $100 thinking it'll be worth it. Then 2 days later they release new "all powerful" gear, rendering your gear obsolete, and you can't get the newest gear without spending another $100!!! They market the gear as being worth a certain amount, then they devalue it days later without giving you a refund because they want to sell you the REAL powerful gear.... It's a racket. They are thieves and liars.

title: Don't even think about it.
review: I made the mistake of getting sucked in and wanting to play at a higher level. That costs money, lots of money. It is really ridiculous right now and has been for more than a few months. Upgrades and game changes come at a relentless pace. Gear and other items quickly become obsolete and the guys that are big spenders or find ways to load their own packs soon overpower anything you have. it becomes a case of you chasing your own tail. Not to mention some serious flaws in the algorithms which now heavily favor the attackers. There was a time you could set up a pretty good defense base with top level troops. Now they drop like flies and are extremely expensive if you want to replace them. It is obvious the developers have done this on purpose to drive up sales. Well, guess what guys, many are fed up with current events and quitting daily. Additionally, since so many players are leaving, all you find is dead bases everywhere and things are now boring as hell. Epic War outpaced themselves on this one in the name of money. My advice, stay away and save your hard earned cash.

review: OK game, spent over $1000.00 on this game trying to keep up with other players. Top alliances in state make rules everyone must follow or they destroy everything you build. Then when you do fight all that happens is you watch a tank go across screen to target, then it shoots 7 or so shots, then you get a battle report... $1000.00 plus? title: mobile strike review
review: Use to be a nice game and I been have playing it for 14 months. The developers really tanked this game by releasing buggy code so the game is unstable. Amount things they release is ridiculous in a short time and no one can keep up. One day your base is upto date and literally next day it is out of date. Other thing is you try to tell their support staff of problems you get some automated response from them that is crap and really do address issues for their customers. Really sad I have invested lot money in this game and basically they turned a good game into a piece of crap. Anyone looking a playing game do not even consider downloading it. Developers do not care about thier customer base and more in turn trying to milk everything from their customers as profit is more important than game content.

title: I strongly recommend avoiding this game
review: The in game ads are extremely deceptive, the in game purchases are often not recieved and customer service is not willing to remedy any issues.To build an account that can actually play costs many hundreds of dollars.Â  Once you get there, the game updates come so quickly you are obsolete and unable to play within a week and you must spend hundreds more o to upgrade again. This cycle never ends.I strongly recommend avoiding this game.

title: *AVOID --DO NOT DOWNLOAD, CUSTOMER SERVICE ARE HAPPY TO RIP YOU OFF!!!!
review: The game is only playable when you DON'T PAY in the beginning and until you reach level 15 thru 21. After that they force you to buy a pack or you can't grow any further or compete with everyone else. When you buy a pack that supposed to level you up with everything it Doesn't!!!. I contacted customer service about the pack I bought and was informed that I bought a different named pack which is a LIE. They purposeful deceive customers and have ZERO support....AVOID THE GAME ENTIRELY

title: Bait and switch
review: Game starts off about strategy (selecting correct troop type, caculate appropriate attack %). Then constant and expensive upgrades become necessary to avoid immediate devastation. Eventually there is no strategy, it's just spend, spend, spend. Weekly changes cost $99 for necessary new gear, commander level, research, etc. Some players say they've spent well over $500.

title: Nothing but a money grab
review: I play a lot of games on my phone. Almost all of them have in app purchases.Â  This one is horrible.Â  You spend $5. Then $19 or so. Then it constantly spams you to buy $100 package. It takes a lot of screen. Also,Â  this game can not be really good if you don't spend $500. I mean you would die before things finished. Or you couldn't even start them because the parts you need are only in the $100 package. You can't even farm things to get the parts.Â  This is a money grab.Â  Very disappointed

title: Another scam game to get your money
review: The packs for this game are very expensive yet you get very little for the price.Â  3 day shields are hard to come by unless you purchase packs or gold.Â  It's just like Game if War.Â  If you want to be a serious player you have to drop serious money.

title: Great game needs 1 update
review: In mobile strike I have 2 training grounds (I downloaded it yesterday don't judge me) 1 of them was training 1 of them was not I wanted to train foot soilders but 1 of them was training motors (just to clear it up) 1 of them was training motors 1 wasn't training anything when I went to the empty training one and tried to train foot soilders it said you are already training troops IN THE ONE THAT WAS TRAINING MORTORS (if you STILL don't understand) I wanted to train foot soilders in a empty one but I couldn't because one training grounds was training mortors what I am trying to say is if one is training and one is not should you be able to train in the one that is not training? P.S am I the only one that noticed this?

title: Very choppy interface
review: OMG! I could not get past the choppy interface and the way it forces you to do certain missions. I understand that there is a minimum amount that you need to do, but it bounced between training and nothing and stuff for players familiar with the game without my input. It might just be a buggy game on my 3rd gen Fire HD, but I ran a couple of things to clear out the memory clutter and it didn't help. Maybe it's too dependent on server connection, and I was getting poor connectivity. I'm not sure.Looks like it has *potential* to be better on a better hardware, so I gave it 2 stars instead of just 1.

title: I guess I am not to bright. After about ...
review: I guess I am not to bright. After about 3 days of building up my base... being attacked twice... and viewing how to play. I lost interest. I could not replay any of the attacks and I never figured out how to attack another base. I seen a coworker play it. He spent a heck of a lot of money where I selected not to spend any.

title: There is little to no enjoyment out of this game without spending thousands
review: There is little to no enjoyment out of this game without spending thousands. Yes thkusands!!! And you are still left empty and finding yourself dumpling more money. The only concern for them is money and you get very little for it. Stay away from this game!

title: If I was the CEO I would fire all the managers and developers for putting out a product that is marginal at best. Fix your game
review: Developers don't care enough about game play and only care about trying to get as much money out of the players. Haven't fixed the gold store, made releases for war bonds but never finished setting up the ability to use them, and many other issues but they want to release something new almost daily. Game will cost you $1000's just to stay in it. If I was the CEO I would fire all the managers and developers for putting out a product that is marginal at best. Fix your game and stop releasing so much so quickly that it feels like you are trying to kill the game.

title: this sucks.
review: I just got this game because it looks awesome but my mobile crashed 10 times in 5 minutes. Dont get this game for kids or anyone because it will crash or take you to the appstore this game is total crap. Do better on a game if you want to make you. Don't be like this game.

title: TERRIBLE GAME! They target your wallet by generating a ...
review: TERRIBLE GAME! They target your wallet by generating a competitive atmosphere. They don't care about the game and its users, they only care about the $$ coming in.A great financial strategy that has made the developers millions of dollars. One of my friends has spent nearly $1000 and his game power is not even relevant, that's just enough to have minimal activity every day. I spent $19.99 and quickly realized where this was going. NOT WORTH ANYONE'S TIME!!!

title: Written to save you from a big mistake.
review: Don't waste your time or money. If you aren't prepared to spend, literally, thousands of dollars, don't bother. You won't be competitive and you will basically be playing FarmVille to get minuscule amounts of what you need for growth. Bigger players will bully you by attacking and destroying your base regularly. Even a middle of the road spender is a non factor. If you aren't going to spend AT LEAST $300 PER WEEK don't get this game.The things you buy with money are absolute in 4-8 weeks. They fluff the purchase packs with obsolete items to make it look like a huge deal. They release new things every week. Sometimes $100 will get it for you sometimes it's up to 7 $100 purchases and everything you got is trash in a matter of weeks because they release something newer and better.Most players are bullied out of the game in the first month. 3 to 4 months in it's nothing but big and medium spenders with no targets to hitÂ  because the little guys all quit and the medium guys all stay shielded from all of the big players who all split off into alliances for big spenders only.Customer service is terrible. Complaints fall on deaf ears. You get generic computer generated broad topic responses. The response has a link to continue to push your issue but you only get another generic computer generated response. EW games and the Mobile Strike team have made a game that will soak up your money and become stale in about 3 months time and won't give you the time of day if you voice your concerns or bring your issue to them to be resolved.DONT MAKE THE MISTAKE OF WASTING YOUR TIME OR MONEY ON THIS GARBAGE

title: Game freezes - no tech support
review: Yes you have to spend money to get the things you really need to advance in the game.Â  The game is way too complex, made so by EW. The marketing department has total control of EW. None of the several performance problems ever gets fixed. After my last in-app purchase the game freezes up making is largely unplayable.Â  Four different "representatives" have replied to my email.Â  Still no fix.

title: Just dont
review: Fun game if you literally have $20,000 to spend. Otherwise, enjoy the game but don't spend any money. You will be sorry if you do. I spent $30 and it was worth that to see the ridiculous things others will do on a phone game. SMH

title: A waste of my time
review: Constantly have to purchase stuff,can't play at all.

title: STAY AWAY!
review: Unbelievable waste of money & time. The game sucks you in with initial low $$ upgrade packs. However, it rapidly involves hundred dollar and up packs in your attempt to keep up with the high power players who are stalking unshielded bases. You cannot hope to ever gain enough power to compete without pending thousands (yes, I'm not exaggerating. THOUSANDS) of dollars. Parents, keep your kids clear of this scam, they will blow every dime they might have on this time waster.

title: SCAM!
review: Possibly the worst scam of all time. I read a lot of reviews and they're all correct. You have to spend thousands to even compete and hundreds monthly to keep up. Each research tree is easily $1,000 or more to complete. Once completed they will release more stuff so you have to keep spending. I have spent any money in quite some time as I learned my lesson. The servers are god awful and the lag is consistent. I started playing this game in November of 2015 and it was one of the worst decisions I've ever made in my life and I'm not kidding. RUN and RUN FAR away from this game.

title: Buyer Beware it is not free.
review: Mobile Strike you can pay $30,000 or more to be a top player and they continue to release more paying modules.to buy. Buyer Beware the game is addictive and costly.Arnold Schwarzenegger should be a shamed of his endorsement of this money grubbing game

title: Don't fall for it!
review: This game was a LOT of fun to play at the beginning. You did not have to spend any money, if you did not choose to do so. Now, it is absolutely impossible to play without having to spend a LOT of money just to keep up. You will NEVER be able to keep up with all the new stuff they come out with on a weekly basis, as the stuff you just purchased for $99 is worthless in a couple of weeks. DO NOT get caught up in this money trap!! If you want to spend money on a game, try a gambling site. At least you have a minuscule chance of getttung some of your money back. With this game, you have ZERO chance of recouping any of your hard earned money. You can spend a lot of money, only to find out that you lost most of your investment in an attack or a battle.

title: HORRIBLE COMPANY
review: MZ is only after money, do not download and play unless you have thousands. Games are laggy and very pay to play. Customers are not important unless they can spend almost daily to stay competitive. Join the GOW strike, and make MZ realize they have to listen to players and not just chase $$$$.

title: Ripp off
review: Cheap knock off of Game of War. Gold Packs offer very little for the price. To play for free takes ages to build your Fort. The packs don't offer enough speed up or resources. When I complained to their customer service about rip off gold packs they said they would take it to their sales department.Â  No changes made since. Gold packs are still a rip off.I guess they sell their packs so high, so they can pay Arnold Swarzenger the millions to do their commercials.

title: Money pit!! Beware.
review: I admit this game sucks you in. If your competitive.. This game is right in your wheel house. If! You have unlimited assess to money. I've seen people literally spend 40k and more on this game. There is no limit. I stopped at $100. I forced my self to stop. I could not complete with guys that spend thousands of dollars to get super bases and soldiers and gear. And new gear comes out literally every week that cost money. More than the hundred dollars I put in. So I'm getting zeroed out by these guys. All the research and work I put in to my account. The countless I mean some times eight hours. I'd set timers to remember to do stuff or reset things. All that work wiped out by a guy that spends hundreds of more dollars than me. I got mad and said enough. I can't buy anymore 100 is my max I can't play and be comfortable than to heck with it. Look! They got the ultimate action hero batting for them of course paying him a lot for his promo.. You know some shady dealing is taking place. It's obvious the way they nickel and dime you. I'm not kidding the least bit, downloadÂ  the game you'll see what I'm talking bout. Remember I said it here people are spending 40k and more and it's still not enough to beat people that spend 100k Im not pulling your leg one bit.

title: Don't bother, it's a waste of time and money
review: Worst game ever. You literally spend lots of money to tap your screen thousands of times just trying to get a workable base. Then they short you files and things you need to keep sucking you dry. THEN they come out with new stuff weekly to keep you spending money and pushing buttons. Oh, and forget customer service. WORST ever! They fix, nothing, give you nothing and keep telling you to wait. Just wait...but keep spending money. I now people who have spent almost 10,000 usd on their base and still can't compete . You can't even kill enemy anymore. Just wound them. I'm a level 40, 4mt power base and I don't have mobile ops nor can I kill a level nine rebel. I send tickets everyday to no avail. It's a complete waste of time and money. I regret even getting started. I spent two hours last night trying to set commander skill tree for a set of gear...right when I'd get about 2500 of the over 3000 points set the game booted me. Four times! I finally gave up. Oh...and wanna attack? You're gonna get booted at least three times. It's a serious waste of life. I'm sick of tapping my device thousands of times a day just to set up a base that's worthless.

title: Was fun, now greed is the name of the game
review: This used to be fun. Now with all the updates and Greed, the game is too costly. The game should really be called Mobile Greed. You spend money on items and 3 days later they are obsolete because there are better items to buy. This happens EVERY week, sometimes multiple times a week! Don't download. not worth the time or money anymore

title: What a waste of money and time - we just want Red Alert back
review: What a waste of money - we just want Red Alert back and have some great battles - not this load of tosh. We're happy to pay for a game - but at the start if it stops all the greedy money top-ups. Do not play, the adverts are nothing like the game play

title: Boring oh no wait yep boring
review: Boring. No real strategy nor do you feel part of a battle. You just wait and wait and wait then spend money to wait less but you still wait

title: Dont try
review: They rip you off and at times don't give you everything you buy also they give no care about complaints from people who fill their wallets

title: FIX THE CRASHES FOR FIRE TABLET
review: Good game but on the fire tablet keeps closing out \ kicking me out

title: Game went downhill fast ð
review: Horrible game with no strategy and way to expensive. Horrible lag, poor servers and no accountability from Epic War.

title: Good Social Game / Terrible & Greedy Developer
review: There is no way to play this game and be relevant in the fighting aspect of it without spending thousands.Â  Every update asks you to spend more, and if you don't then you can no longer participate in most of the game.Â  EW is far too greedy, and spending money on this game is like throwing it into a black hole.Â  Don't waste your cash or your time.

title: all wasted time and money
review: Greedy developers, not a free game, daily updates and constant glitches. Avoid completely. I played until earlier this year from the launch; all wasted time and money.

title: Game of War Clone...The Total Turdfest That Is "Mobile Strike"...Do Not Download or Play!
review: I wrote a review many months ago about Game of War: Fire AgeThat review has become the highest rated (most helpful) review for GoW and that is because I stripped away the BS and told the complete truth about it. I could write the exact same review for Mobile Suck. Why? Well...here are the reasons:1. Mobile Suck is the exact same game as Game of War. There are zero differences other than purely cosmetic ones. The game play is the same. The psychological ploys to separate you from literally thousands of dollars are the same. Everything is the same.2. Mobile Strike is produced by the same pack of sadistic con artists and child molesters as Game of War. Yes, it's true. Epic War LLC is a subsidiary of Machine Zone. Feel free to look them up and you will see that they are both listed with the same street address (555 Hamilton Ave) in Palo Alto, CA.Mobile Suck is an exact copy of Game of War. It is designed to deceive you and to con you out of a ridiculous amount of money. Just like Game of War.There is no point in me writing another review for this over ripe turd of a game. Just go to the Game of War page and read my review. I will, however, issue you the following general warning:1. Do not download and play this game unless you are very wealthy and/or very gullible. This game is all about the destruction of money. Your money and your competitors money. This is a pay-to-win game. You CANNOT be competitive in this game without spending hundreds of dollars per month. Many, many hundreds of dollars. Some of your competitors will be so wealthy and so stupid that they will spend thousands of dollars per month so that they can crush you and destroy the money you have spent. At its most basic root, Mobile Suck (and Game of Spending) are only about the destruction of money...your money and your competitors' money. You will be conned, coerced and manipulated into spending so that you can "win" but you won't win. You will only lose a staggering amount of your money and you will have ZIP to show for it.2. Do not download and play this game if you wish to have a life. This game will destroy all of your free time. You will spend every waking moment working in and on this game. You will sacrifice time to play this game that would otherwise be spent in the real world with your family and friends doing things that are of actual value.3. Never, ever allow a child to play this game. That would be child abuse. I am totally sincere about this. Keep children away from this monstrosity. If you are foolish enough to allow a child to play it then make damn good and sure that the kid cannot get a hold of your credit card or iTunes account. But don't let a child play this game.So there you have it. Mobile Suck is Game of Spending, the absolute worst game ever offered on Amazon or anywhere else. If you want to truly help people then write a short one star review warning them to stay away from this complete and total turdfest.

title: MS DON'T PLAY
review: Unbelievable cost required to play the game, keep up and not lose everything.Â  Every few days a pack is introduced which you need to avoid losing all your troops which are also ridiculously expensive.

title: Pay to play, biased and unfair gaming enviromnet, Sided all to the buyers and not to the Free players. WAlk away from this one.
review: Totally a payer dominated game.Â  Unless you are willing to dump thousands of dollars out don't even start.Â  they hook you on the great package deals but if you are a new player you don;t have a chance.Â  You can lose all your troops and never cover them.Â  Don;t waste your time and money on this trash gaming, go buy something that you can at the least enjoy playing in a fair environment.Â  I have been playing for over a year and a half,Â  have not dropped 1% of what some of these players have spent on it.

title: The ideal was to play on a mobile device to give me something to do however I think the lack of maintenance has just destroyed my faith where I question getting sucked in further to any game which requires $$$ to ...
review: Seemed to run smooth on IPAD at first but I think they just added too much to the game where the high crash rate of the app has reached an unacceptable level.Â  I foolishly just threw money into a money pit and regret ever spending a dime to play this game.Â  Customer service has not been much help and I'm now disputing my purchases with both Itunes and possibly my credit card company to see if I have a case.Though in the end I guess I eat it since all sales are so called final however as a paying customer, I'm not getting what I pay for which is quality and stability.Â  The ideal was to play on a mobile device to give me something to do however I think the lack of maintenance has just destroyed my faith where I question getting sucked in further to any game which requires $$$ to progress.Â  There are many decent games out there that won't drain your wallet but to each their own.All I can say is I'm not getting my money's worth thus the reason for the negative review.Â  This has possibly become a case of gross negligence or let the buyer beware.Â  Just an FYI on what to expect on some devices.

title: Unless you are rich, stay away!
review: Game concept is cool, and very fun. However, very expensive to play if you want to get to a respectable base. (Around $3,000 - $10,000 minimum) Without adding money, you fall behind other players that add money.Â  Game crashes and lags a lot! I've tried this game on many different devices and PC with same results. Many errors and by bugs still in game. Spend that kind of money, and your game crashes or lags, you can lose everything! Technical support is as good as asking your cat for help. You are wasting your time and money on this one! Overall horrible. Needs to be improved before I play anymore and waste more money and time. This game is not truely about skill, but more about the money. They should refund everyone's money that loses everything due to game errors. Graphics are ok, but nothing like commercial. Rather lame durring the war part of the game. I've played this game since day one, and have a lot of regret, due to crashes, lagging and bugs still in game. You literally have no chance in this game without adding serious monies.

title: Save your money do not even download this game.
review: In my opinion any experienced player of this game will tell you its a total ripoff.Â  Only beginners like it.Â  It is NOT a game - you constantly need to spend your money to compete.... but there really is no ultimate goal.Â  It is just spend spend spend.Â  Once you max your base dont worry they come out with something new and expensive within hours.Â  My opinion is to STAY AWAY.Â  Arnold Schwarzenegger should be ashamed having his name tied to this scam.

title: Don't waste your money
review: Waste of money and time. Spend days building up fort, then maxed out / hacked player ports next to your fortifications and completely wipes you out.Bye bye money spent on upgrades !

title: No customer service.
review: No customer support.Â  Our entire state of Cosa has been down for over 24 hours and we all are getting canned responses that do not help us at all.Â  Very disappointed after having spent money on the game to get this treatment.

title: Bad
review: Do not play if you want a lot of money

title: Dead game
review: Too many updates.Â  Too expensive.Â  They update 2-3 times per week.Â  If you don't buy then your base is zeroed.Â  It's pay to play.Â  95% of every state is now low population because this game is dead.Â  Only the new protected states are high population.Â  Once they're opened up those players will be zeroed and that state will die.

title: Fun for a month or so, which is not worth the effort.
review: Requires attention at least once a week to avoid being hit over and over in PvP once you finish leveling up. So there's nothing worth doing anymore.

title: A giant piece of crap wrapped in a Arnold Schwarzenegger-themed jacket
review: I wish there was a way to give negative stars. This game is a piece of crap wrapped in a Arnold Schwarzenegger-themed jacket. Unless you have a couple thousand dollars to flush down the toilet, you will never be good enough to compete with the endless list of tools with disposable income that do. ..And trust me, they are the biggest tools I've ever seen in any game and I've been online gaming since Quake1 first had 16 player FPS servers. DO NOT PLAY THIS GAME! ITS A WASTE OF TIME AND ESPECIALLY MONEY!

title: Don't download this game, all it will do is cost you too much money!!!
review: I would love to give it more but with what they charge for the packs and the cost of resources, speed, and files to do anything is absolutely ridiculous. Just to research you have to purchase over a dozen packs to even get close to completion. Not to finish but complete. The creators and whoever manages this game is very greedy. Instead of giving back to the consumer all they do is want more!! Kinda done with this game.

title: Another negative review
review: As others have mentioned, the gold packs are ridiculously weak. If you don't want to spend money don't play this game. If you have thousands to spend on a game that offers nothing for your investment then, be my guest, but don't think you can get over by trying to play without spending thousands of dollars. Imho, it takes at least one pack per level up of your base. The game offers challenges, but the pay outs are even weaker than the gold packs. The amount of rss and gold u spend to reach a goal are100x more than the payouts. If the packs were 5 bucks each it might be doable. $100 a day won't get you to the top at their current price.

title: BUY GOLD and make them RICH
review: there is no real point to this game . they blast BUY GOLD in your face at every turn. they are using shwarzenegger as an advertising scheme with these killer graphics on tv. in reality the graphics suck . they make every task take forever so that you will buy gold to speed it up. the funny part is they are making millions of the green stuff everyday

title: Mobile Strike, when does the fun begin?
review: Hated this game.Â  It took forever to read instructions that auto populate as you are trying to play and I never got to a point where I was actually playing the game.Â  Maybe it is just me but I found Mobile Strike Not user friendly!!

title: Installed fine, graphics look good
review: Installed fine, graphics look good. Literally everything else about this game is awful. Too linear, not enough action....OK I can deal with that. But EVERYTHING on the screen is there to make you pay money. Between interstitials and bonus challenges that can only be accessed if you pay money, it leaves a sour taste in your mouth. I LITERALLY spend more time "x"ing out pay-for pop-ups than progressing my character. It's embarrassing and makes you wonder how much money they paid Arnold that they need to make a crappy money sacking game to recoup it. Stay away

title: DONT GET THIS GAME!
review: Do not get this game! It wouldn't even download it was just stuck at 25%. It is just a copy of Game of war(GOW)

title: Don't get sucked in
review: If you are not ready to spend thousands per month every month dont play. Not joking Most expensive game i have ever seen

title: Pretty cool game
review: Cool game! I downloaded this game after game of war fire age got boring. And I loved it!!

title: One star if that.
review: This game in general is not fit to be on amazons list of Apps. It is buggie as all get out. They constantly do updates.Â  New nickname for updates is downdates. The game is completely centered on hooking you to spend. After 18 months of playing, beware.

title: terrible NOT FREE
review: Do not buy unless rich they cheat u out on itð ð¬ð¡ð ðððð

title: Walk away Fast
review: There is no strategic defense against a player who has been playing before you and has built up power. You will be continually attacked for your resources and have to spend time or real money building back up - a vicious circle of a time waster. And it is making some of these more powerful players wealthy selling what resources they take from the weaker and selling them back to you and others on outside pirate sites.The only defense is to use gold to buy 24/7 shields to protect your base and spend real money for more gold when you run out. And when you are collecting resources you will have to watch your collecting troops non stop...take your eye off them for a second and you will loose them all to attack and then take you weeks if not months to build your troops back up. Not designed for people that have a job or a real life.

title: this is SUN AZZJACK
review: This game is unfair cuz the powerful come after low numbered power people. If u do not want to spend money do not get trust me.

title: Bad Game bad developers
review: Doesn't worth it

title: Mobile Strike App is just a money pit scam
review: Terrible development. Unless you can afford to spend hundreds to thousands a month on in game purchases, don't bother. They release some new pack every few days to few weeks, and the $99.99 packs are the only ones even worth buying because the others won't even keep you competitive with anyone else in the game. The other problem is the glitchiness, lag and sever errors due to the massive load on the game. I have had several problems with the game. I've spent close to $700 on I app purchases already, and the programmers say of fixing the issue is by throwing a few perks your way that don't even come close to making up for what their server lag and app crashes cost you. They even had an issue where items in some of their premium packs weren't showing up in your in game inventory when you bought them, and they weren't telling anyone even though they were aware of the issue. They customer support team even admitted this in an email correspondence with me when I confronted them about missing items.

title: Game of cash and zero skills!
review: This game is literally a carbon copy of Game of War, everything about it is the same. They just changed the theme and that's it.Â  So just like GoW it's simply a TRAP to make money. It has terrible graphics (nothing like the Ads) and needs very little skills and TONS of cash! It's also super frustrating when you start as people with thousand times stronger armies simply burn and kill your bases over and over, which is an ingenious way to make you PAY so you could defend yourself and try to grow.Literally everything is about selling you gold! EVERYTIME you start the game, or even open a notification they POP-up an Ad to buy gold, over and over and over again. It's ridiculously annoying. Feels like a porn site with pop-up ads. Then, when you decide to buy a pack, it gets interesting. Your first purchase is $5, your second $25, then goes to a $100 and more! And they're all the same! So the same pack that cost you $5 earlier in the game will cost you $150 later on! Exactly the same thing. So basically they're raising the price on the customers who spend money again and again.The strategy part simply doesn't come into play until you are level 21 or above. Until then, it's just a matter of who loses patience and who shells out the cash to get to HQ21. Then you can have battles with your alliance and start strategizing. It takes you easily 45-60 days to get there if you spend less than $100 and even with more spending it takes a month or so.Overall, the game could have been amazing if it wasn't for all the annoying ads and price increasing gold packs, and if it had better structure to help smaller players. Graphics could also be improved, like the fake ads they made.Overall, do NOT let your kids play this game, nor should you. UNLESS you're willing to spend hundreds to thousands of dollars! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!PS. It's a lot cheaper to buy someone's account online than to start from scratch.

title: Before January 2017 this game was fun and fairly expensive
review: Before January 2017 this game was fun and fairly expensive. Now it's just a cash cow. In total I have spent 13,450.00 and I'm now way behind everyone else. They add new things every 3/4 days now and if you don't have it you're too weak to compete. All of this is bad enough but now they've begone literally stealing players money. I bought a 100.00 pack and 5 minutes later got charged a second 100.00 dollars. They refuse to return my money or give the pack I paid for saying they have no record of the purchase. I know 30 people who have had the same thing happen to them. So I decided to play with just gift cards but I ran into the new con where they take the money but don't give you the pack. They swear the items are in my account only they aren't. I've sent 6 Screenshots showing this but they just keep lying and swearing it's there. To make things even worse I began getting attacked last night and the game kicked me out. I tried over and over to get back in only to get a server busy error. I had to uninstall then reinstall to get back in. When I did I found out the game switched my gear so I was weaker and that I had lost over half of my billions of troops. Do not be fooled this game is now crap and not worth playing.

" Company based in Cali as a LLC " RESIDES ON THE THIRD FLOOR" to comply to U.S Laws but that is not the parent company.Each state does have a bully but over all its not a bad game. The rallies can take 5 minutes to deploy which gives you enough time to shield. Which kind of sucks because if you really want to destroy a bully you can. It makes it real hard to defeat a bully. They don't even allow speed ups on the rally which is another terrible thing but you can speed up regular attacks.The game is good but it does lack features. I have sent these concerns to Mobile strike and they don't care!

I keep getting notifications that I don't have the Amazon App store installed and I will have to shut down the App two or three times to get it working. Why is Amazon monitoring what I have on my Kindle and it's a kindle! How can I not have the Amazon App store on my Amazon Kindle? I keep checking my account to make sure this isn't some sort of malicious trojan horse, it sucks having to cross my fingers. I know the only reason the developers haven't fixed the app is because people are still playing it, but pretend you care as much about customer service as Amazon does and take a look at these annoying bugs.

title: A flat out bad game
review: Don't waste your time (or money) with this game.Â  I foolishly played this game for a couple months and spent a fair amount of money.Â  I will tell you all you need to know:-There is literally nothing to do in this game. After you get over the "excitement" of upgrading buildings and troops you'll discover that those cool looking battles you see on the commercials are no where to be found.Â  Battles take 2 seconds and have zero interaction and are completely determined by the AI.-You can spend $100s of dollars on this game and quickly realize that's just barely enough to get off the ground.Â  The top players spend $1000s of dollars on this game.Â  Prepare to get stomped every day by these players.-There is no skill involved in this game. It is purely who can spend the most money and spend the most time online.-The penalty for losing battles is incredibly high. The top players can cut your whole army down and take all your resources without batting an eye.Â  These armies can take weeks to build up and can disappear in 2 seconds.-You can't have a life and play this game. If something distracts you from logging in and checking on your base you will constantly lose everything in your base.Â  If you can't login at least once a day just forget it.Â  It gets to a point where all you are doing is rebuilding and not actually progressing.This game is just a giant scam and plays off of people's emotions to pump more of their hard earned dollars into this game.Â  My advice is to save your time and money and get any other game besides this.

title: Dollars and Time Dissappears into the Mobile Strike Ruleless Black Hole
review: Mobile Strike, if you have thousands of dollars to spend to become like the power players, well, then you will be just fine.Â  The problem is to make your base grow you must continually spend to buy items needed to grow your base.Â  This is not altogether bad; it becomes an issue when you sit under the peace shield 24 hours each day.Â  Each state has a head of state who makes the rules and changes them at whim or whenever they are in a bad mood.Â  These players can have over 1 billion in power and you can't even scratch them.Â  For example I have a Level 21 base with 90 million power, today was nap which is a no attack period until midnight.Â  The leader of the state decided to change the rules today and gave 1 hours notice and believe me, this was a lot of notice for him.Â  On the drive home from work my peace shield expired even though I don't need it during nap I have learned to use it.Â  I sat in traffic and when I got home to check my shield figuring I had until midnight but would initialize it early, the head of state had already gone out and burned all unshielded bases.Â  Destroyed 125k traps, 185k troops and took my commander.Â  It will cost a lot to rebuild the traps and time as well.Â  I don't mind the time element here; however, I do mind that a guy with his daddy's credit card can buy so much power that it is virtually impossible to have any fair game play.Â  Several players gave up and joined his alliance, the old if you can't beat them join them.Â  But, when this leader is on state chat the way he speaks and treats people is worse than Donald Trump crossed with Hitler.Â  As if everything negative in the world is channeled through him and into the game aimed at everyone playing in the game.Â  What would help, the game makers making rules which all must go by including those who are head of state.Â  In this way, at least no attack times are predictable and stable.Â  Otherwise, you must be logged into the game constantly to see what the latest rules are.Â  Also, there are so many alliances who are allies of the head of state there is no one left to actually fight them.Â  Tonight's quick rule change and attack our our alliance made at least 6 players discuss quitting and 3 have quit in the past week.Â  Our alliance has 2 billion in power, this is disgustingly inadequate to do anything.Â  The head of state alone is 20 billion in power.Â  Have fun wasting your time and money.

review: mKvVAt first, this game can be quite fun; however, you will quickly realize that the game is controlled by players that have spent $10000 and more which are virtually unstoppable due to the game mechanics. These high players go around attacking relatively new players for their RSS/resources and sooner or later you will be on that list. Not to mention, the game developers are always releasing upgrades which you can only get by spending some cash.You have 2 choices when playing this game:1. Constantly open your wallet to buy $100 packages. And even if you decide that, there will be someone else that will spend more making your investment worthless.2. Not spend any money but instead be constantly attacked for your hard earned resources.I have spent quite a bit in this game and it has been one of the biggest let downs ever. If I were you, I would not spend a dime for this game or you will come to regret it.

title: Grossly unbalanced game looking for your money
review: This game relentlessly asks you to buy various packages from 4.99 up. The game is grossly unbalanced, with extremely powerful players attacking newcomers in lopsided battles.Â  The stronger player may be close to a million times stronger than the victim.Â  Regular kill events are structured so that any weak players are counted against the stronger players in the sector.Â  This leads to stronger players actively attacking weaker ones so that they quit.Â  Approximately 90% of new players quit within a few days.Â  The game consists of poking buttons to initiate research, building, troop construction, or manufacture, then waiting for the process to complete.Â  It is possible to have expeditions leave base for supplies, but they are vulnerable to attack.Â  In game purchases are not required per we, but it may not be possible to advance rapidly or compete at a reasonable level without the purchases.

title: Get a clue
review: Really people? Have you not read the description?Â  Are there that many ridiculously dumb people out there? Even if kids, if they are able to write a review, they should be able to read the description - it's not supposed to work!Â  I haven't even used the app.Â  My 9 yr old daughter downloaded it and like a good parent, I check up on what she downloads (imagine that).Â  Have never written a review nor probably will again but the other reviews were just so ridiculous, complaining that it didn't get the age right.Â  Once again, it tells you its not supposed to work!Â  I agree it may be stupid, but there's plenty of stupid apps. that some people (like my 9 yr old daughter) find vaguely entertaining - especially when free (someone complained about the cost, again - really? Its free!).Â  What might add some more entertainment is if you could secretly type in the person's age ahead of time to make them actually think it works.Â  Until then people - get a clue!

title: I Want To Believe
review: This thing works.I know because I was sitting out on the front deck with it running and my roommate was with me, reading and pretty much ignoring me.(He's a die-hard skeptic.)So I asked it if anyone wanted to communicate and my roommate, annoyed, told me that "ghosts don't exist".Five minutes of silence and then, out of nowhere, it said, "Robert".My roommate stared at me.That's his name.

title: Worried
review: Guys, this thing is no joke. I went with my father and step mother to an old civil war battlefield a few nights ago. (I had downloaded this app one week prior) I started the app and started asking questions most people would ask a ghost. Who are you? Is there anyone here? I had a camera set up to film everything. I set down my kindle fire to check the video then I hear the word "college". I'm a college student. I brushed it off and kept checking the camera then it says "surrounded" and I get a chill down my spine. I went to check it and the screen showed 4 bright red signatures. Now THAT got my attention. I went back to the camera (this time with the kindle to watch the signals) and kept doing what I was doing. Occasionally, I would look at the screen the check those signals. They were still there. They had not moved. I could feel eyes on me. Watching me. I hear "blood" come on the app. At that point, I realized it was time to go. Coincidence? Maybe. But to me, I was about to **** my pants.

title: CREEPY
review: Well, I'm not that sure whether to believe this app or not. Me and my cousin were just messing around looking for ghost apps and we found this, and downloaded it. We were just watching the words out whatever and it kept saying 'ffee' and we were confused. At the top it said 'Get'and that kinda scared me. I tried joking around and trying to communicating to the 'ghost'. At the top, it said 'Observe'. My cousin said, "What is your name?" And it said 'Joe' and then a huge yellow dot appeared in front of us, and the top said 'Shimmering' It scared me really badly, and I deleted the app instantly. Not because I don't like it, because I was FREAKED OUT. You choose whether to believe it or not..

title: Its more psychological....
review: Well, I wouldn't consider this a fake ....but the likely possibility is that they just have random dots appearing and design it like a real ghost radar and have random common words appearing. I just downloaded it and when I opened my app, it was like "pot " and on the right side of me there was a flower pot. I thought it was cool, but come on, there are pots everywhere! either in your yard or somewhere else, you can always find something common with the random word that appears on the radar. Its a cool app, but in my opinion, they just choose a buncha random words that make you think this app can "detect " stuff when your fooling yourself out. I was using it this morning on my bed and it was like "can, winter, principal "?! Wtf, am I in school or something? lol but this app is worth the download even though it might be fake.

title: Fun but FAKE!! And very simple.
review: I got this app for 2 reasons: it was free, and it looked cool. But it got annoying. All it was, really, was a green radar that showed little dots every so often. I quickly got bored with it and deleted it. Afterwards, I was persuaded to actually BUYING the other version of Ghost Radar, which was supposedly "better." Sure, it was a little cooler. You could go back and forth from the classic radar and an activity waves line graph. It also "translated the ghosts messages to you," which I actually believed for a while. But don't believe a word of it, people. The radar does not "sense" anything. If you want an app that you can just use for fun, go ahead. But it does NOT sense ghosts. Just saying whaylt your gut is screaming.

title: very intimidating.
review: This app seems to work very nice. Ghosts are in my house all the time-consuming I see, hear, and feel them. We had a Ouija board out and this app on and we got words that we didn't expect. We came to find that I have a three year old girl named Elizabeth, a boy which remains U.N. named, and an adult named Corey, aged 22. This app works, because right after my friend left I was alone in the house- I thought. I felt a freezing cold thin layer on my back, and the back of my arms, as if I was being protected out something. I heard a crash outside, and the feeling went away. Turns out, some kids were trying to scare me, but I had no idea who they were even! They walked away when they found out I had a knife, so I haven't seen them again. But it's weird, because they were dressed in old clothes; they were pale, and looked tired or sick. I'll never know! Just be careful, you never know what you're summoning...

I figured it was just a randomly generated word but decided to use it to tease my wife so I said "There is a spirit trying to communicate with us and it saw the dog come into the room and called it a pony!" It then said "understanding"! It freaked us both out. I'm not going to show this one to the kids or they may not be sleeping well.

Now, as a seventh grader, I'm not interested in this stuff anymore. I got this app to see how fake it was. Our parents were asleep so we (my sister and I) thought that was close to"alone" so I turned this on. We have had many pets before. They all died except one that I set free. When I started my homework, I saw a blue dot kind of behind-ish and right-ish. I looked at where you see communication and it said. I said hi and how are you. I said if you want me to turn it off to not die yourself. Nothing appeared so I kept my saying and came into here. This is a great app.Ooh! Just now I realized a dog died next door. When I said " Bailey" two dots appeared. More coming soon!

title: Ghosts? Where?
review: I got this simply to scare myself, but the when I actually opened it, I didn't get scared at all. It's a really fake app and it's a waste of a download. The first word it "said" was 'human'. hmmm...where do you think THAT obvious word came from. I believe in ghosts because I've actually had experience with them before, but there's no way that my house would have three ghosts all at once and then disappear when I tap the screen. It's just like "Okay, spirits, I'm your overlord now because I have an app that lets me "stalk" you guys!" :D but no: Ghosts can do basically what they want and go where they want. It is a really fake app and is a waste of space. If you want a real, accurate ghost tracker, then become a paranormal pro and go buy one. I'm not trying to hate on this app, but yeah. Don't give yourselves a heart attack over nothing.

title: Froze the Firestick
review: Installed on Amazon Firestick with no problem.Â  However, my iPhone 6s would not connect to it.Â  The picture on my TV would only give the AirBeamTV logo and would not allow me to use my controller for the Firestick.Â  Each time I would have to remove the power cord and the Firestick itself to clear the screen and plug it back together to get back control of my Amazon prime video.Â  After 3 attempts I deleted the app and called it a waste of time.

title: Want to easily CAST to your Fire TV device?
review: I found this app while searching for something else and had to try it. No setup required. Just make sure your computer using Google Chrome Browser and your Fire TV device are on the same WiFi segment (or SSID). Install the app on Fire TC (Fire Stick, Fire TV or Fire Cube), then use the 3 dots o the top right of Google Chorme, look for CAST and select your name on your AirPlay app, and you are connected. Very easy.

title: Does not work as a means of mirroring an iOS device to a FireStick
review: March 3, 2020I was looking for an app that would allow me to display photos/home videos etc. from my iPhone & iPad to a non-smartTV via my Amazon FireStick.Â  This app supposedly does that using the Apple AirPlay protocol built in to the newest Apple mobile devices.Â  I downloaded the AirScreen app onto the FireStick from the Amazon website and installed it on the FireStick according to the instructions.Â  According to the pre-loaded tutorial video bundled with the app, I should then have been able to go to any iOS mobile device with AirPlay enabled and from the ControlCenter, scan for other Airplay compatible device connected to the same WiFi network (which the FireStick was) and select that device and begin mirroring.Â  Unfortunately the app was unable to detect either my iPhone or my iPad although both had AirPlay enabled and both were connected to the same WiFi network.I then called Amazon Tech Support and spent about an hour on the line with them while they logged in to remotely view my FireStick screen and operate it remotely.Â  The were unable to solve the issue so the called Apple Support, making it a 3-Way conference call.Â  The Apple support rep remotely logged on to my iPad and operated it remotely.Â  Again, no one was able to make the iPad connect with the FireStick.Â  Since I had already tried and had the same problem with an AirPLay enabled iPhone also, it seemed unlikely to me and to the Apple rep that both iOS devices were malfunctioning but rather that it was either the FireStick and/or the app itself that was the problem.Â  The Apple rep came to the same conclusion, so she departed from the conference call.The Amazon rep remained on the line and we did some further checks to determine if there were any other problems with the FireStick itself, which there were not.Â  Every other non-AirScreen related function of the FireStick appeared to be working normally so we all concluded that there must be a problem with the app itself.I had downloaded the free/demo version of the app, which claims to function fully without upgrading to the paid version, but with advertising pop-ups.Â  I was not going to pay to upgrade until i saw the app work as advertised, which had it done so, I would then have paid to upgrade to the ad-free version.Â  Accordingly I do not know if the upgraded version would have worked properly or not.In short, this app does not do what it claims to do and therefore should be considered useless for the purpose of mirroring an iOS device to a FireTV device.

title: Unreliable, distressing, use better alternatives
review: Recommendation: Use AirReceiver insteadPicture is acceptable, but delayed by several seconds. Keeps warning me that my network is slow. Disconnects after 15 minutes or so to show an ad, requiring a reconnect from the projecting computer and occasionally restarting the app. Ad display is unreliable, in which case it asks you to purchase *a subscription* and waits for 15 seconds.The ad tries to guilt you into a purchase by claiming expensive server requirements. But Miracast is a Wi-Fi Direct connection, and AirPlay and Google Cast go straight to the display... so the servers are either collecting your data or serving ads. Either way it's a ridiculous cost.Â  (Possibly they're saving the "recordings"? I don't want that.)We used AirReceiver and Chrome Cast's "desktop" source. It worked with much less delay, smoother video, no ads, no "slow network" warning, and stayed connected for hours with no issues. AirReceiver was satisfying; AirScreen experience was user-hostile and distressing.Uninstalling ASAP.

title: Effective, but limited
review: The functionality is decent, but it takes some time and fooling around with the app to get it to do what you want. And you either have to use one big block for the outside walls and draw the individual lines inside, or place several blocks next to each other for rooms, you cannot drag and drop a room inside an existing block. This makes it difficult to determine overall dimensions. Lastly, the icon available for closets is the same as the more commonly known symbol for showers. I'm not sure what that is all about. Overall, you can put together a fairly professional looking floor plan with this app, just be prepared to spend hours to do it.

title: Suprising good, could be great.
review: Ok, first, I didn't expect this app to be at all good.Â  Every floor plan app that I've every downloaded was pure junk and I didn't expect this to be any better.Â  SURPRISE!Â  I'm an Architect, so I draw on computers for a living, and I expect software to work with me, not against me.Â  This app does just that... easy to use, and I could hammer out a fast and accurate floor plan and place furniture in it quickly.Â  It's no speed demon, but I am running it on a Kindle Fire and speed is OK.Â  The only short coming that I found was that you can't create your own library of blocks (elements) like furniture or plumbing fixtures.Â  The app comes with a decent starter set, but it's not complete and I really don't want to have to buy these from the author.Â  The app is good and I'd buy other titles from this author without reservations.Â  A happy surprise!~

As a âfreeâ app I feel I got what I paid for and it got the job done after setup.When I googled âprinting to hp printers on fire tabletsâ there were a lot of references to an HP printing app but I could not find it in the Amazon app store. This would be 5 stars if they carried through.

title: Won't print to Kodak ESP
review: I had to manually set up my Kodak ESP 5200 series printer as the scan for printer option failed to detect it after multiple attempts.Â  Tried printing a test page twice and both times the app told me it printed succesfully, but nothing printed. Tried printing a simple list containing 7 lines from a document and the printing item notification just hung there for minutes with no printer activity so I just closed it. Downloaded the Hammermill print app from the Amazon app store and after opening it, it had found my printer and I printed a test page within 30 seconds. Tried printing that list mentioned previously but had to update a rendering and font "software", but that took seconds as well and was printing in no time. Printbot just doesn't cut it.

title: Wished it wasn't so flawed.
review: I got the free version to use with my Foscam so I could help my dog with his separation anxiety.Â  It took a bit of time to figure out how to use it when I was away from home.Â  It works pretty well and I purchased the upgrade so I could have access to the audio.Â  Unfortunately, it is a very clumsy app.Â  When i try to use it remotely, the microphone often does not work. So i can hear my pup howling and crying but am helpless to calm him down.Â  Also, the camera randomly begins scanning the room and it takes time to get it focused back on my pup.Â  In this technologically rich culture, it is a shame this is so difficult to figure out and use.Â  I don't recommend this product.

title: Locks up Kindle Fire!!!
review: I have tried this app (and the pro version) on FIVE different Kindle Fire devices, and it freezes all of them! The developer has indicated that he does not care. Apparently he doesn't think there are enough Kindle users to worry about. This has been going on for nearly a year, so it's not like I haven't given him enough time to respond, or fix it. Some developers are very helpful and responsive. This one is not, and this app is useless if you have a Kindle.

title: Great app but constantly locks up my Kindle Fire
review: This is a great free app I use for my Foscam cameras.Â  I got it connected fairly easily but if I push the wrong button, I have to end up resetting my KFire.Â  I'm still learning how to avoid making it lock up, at least it is predictable, so I can work with it for now.

title: Nice, but app a little buggy
review: Pro:I can display several cameras at once and see a realtime display from them all at the same time, something my stock camera app won't do.Con:Among others, I have 2 Wyze cameras.Â  I have 1 fixed camera and 1 camera with pan/tilt/zoom (PTZ).Â  App constantly confuses which is which, resulting in my loss of ability to control the pan/tilt of the camera with PTZ because the app thinks that is the fixed one.Â  I've removed and re-added the cameras multiple times in different orders to try and fix this, but it keeps happening.

title: CBS is behind the times
review: Said on the TV the game I was trying to watch would be available with this app, but all it did was show the general broadcast with the game that went on too long. CBS schedules games too close together, and the worst part is they don't have the sporting events on demand after it's over with so you can watch it in its entirety when the game is over.

title: constant buffering
review: Instead of enjoying the game that I look forward to every year I became more and more frustrated and angry with our brand new larger smart TV with voice activation Alexa and all the other bells and whistles. All so I have the same problem with watching amazon prime movies as well.

title: Laborious and Greedy
review: The CBS presentation has always screamed boring, but the monetization of CBS apps have made these apps nearly unbearable. You have to log in to your provider each time you exit the app and load it back up, which is far too tedious, and even still you may get the "Sorry, your TV provider is not yet supported in your location" message. It's a true waste of time far too often, and I only have to try when my NFC NFL team has to play on the network. You may find yourself relegated to using a tablet and starring at a nine inch screen for three hours on the Yahoo Sports App if you're relying on this one.

title: Not Great
review: My husband spent a couple of hours trying to get the channel to work right. At first, I thought it was our Internet signal, so I went back to Sling to see if the other shows worked; they worked fine -_- for some reason, it just wouldn't stream our game, and when it did stream it, the picture quality was terrible and it kept freezing. Awful.

title: Wanted news app got sports app ?? To liberal will delete
review: I downloaded news app and got sports app, very liberal channel, dont like and will delete because to liberal

title: Errors committed
review: I'm not going to be that CBS over this. But if you can offer a product you need to make sure it works accordingly to what it says it will do. It did not streamline I miss my Florida Gators because it kept turning off and showing the reason for something about errors. CVS s fine shows that I like and movies unfortunately it didn't work for me this way I used to fire stick. If somebody asked me what I recommend CVS I said I think it probably would be okay if you had a hard wire but it seems to have a problem with Wi-Fi I may be wrong I don't know. But each his own because what works for you may not work for me and vice versa.

title: Frustrating
review: I tried on my Prime, after buying CBS five day trial in order to watch the Florida Alabama game Dec. 19, to access the game.Â  I tried all the pathways possible and could not get to the game to watch. We cannot get CBS locally because of a dispute Dish has with channel 5 and we have missed many programs already.Â  I was hoping to be able to use Prime to view CBS.

title: CBS Sports
review: I hate ESPN, but ABC NBC hell PBS has better more legitimate reports and staff. Matt Snyder for instance wants to water down the MLB HoF with a bunch of pumped up cheats. Yeah CBS trying hiring better people, people who want to reward cheating over actual athletics. Henry Aaron and Babe Ruth just spat on today's BWAA

title: Thank You
review: I had no idea how I was going to watch the Superbowl this year since I cancelled all my subscription TV. CBS Sports Stream came into view for me just in time. Awesome picture with the occasional buffer spot but no complaints here. Looking forward to getting to watch sports again.

title: Nothing is free
review: This is less a problem with the app, which works fine, and more a complaint about CBS. You can't stream anything through the app for free. Even if you pay for CBS through cable, you still can't stream TV through it. Seriously? You want me to pay extra to be able to stream live TV?

title: Cut Short
review: I cannot pick up local CBS channel so it was great to have this as I wanted to see and hear Gladys Knight sing the National Anthem. I did get involved in the game so I left it on and was able to view it all till the last 1:47 seconds. It cut off and I could not get it back. No problem, I heard the outcome.

title: Only one of the networks to require additional license beyond cable

title: Streaming the Super Bowl was at best bad
review: Streaming the Super Bowl was at best bad, consistently buffering throughout the game, FPS dropping to nothing but pix elated blobs and unidentifiable objects. But on the upside! CBS streamed each and every commercial break in full HD!Â  Never once during the commercial breaks did the I ever witness the poor reception as I did throughout the game. Funny.At least I accomplished one thing on Superbowl Sunday, I finished my laundry during the buffering sessions.
