title: Trial customer BEWARE!!
review: Google advertised the Bengal - Steeler game on Fubo.Â  I signed in on the 7-day trial subscription plan.Â  The game was not on the listed channels.Â  After 10 minutes I looked for the cancellation provision.Â  There was none, so I signed out.Â  In order to check if I was cancelled out, I went to the Fubo consultation desk.Â  I was told I'd have to pay $1 for an answer.Â  So I paid using PayPal.Â  Then I received my e-mailed answer, which was a generic "quickie."Â  It told me to talk to the heads of the channels I looked into for the game.Â  This one is the worst I've seen since "Rich Dad Poor Dad" when it comes to indelible pests.

title: Good line up but otherwise very very poor. Only useful for live games
review: The options for streaming sports are limited, but fubo is not the answer. Although they have a good selection of options, the service overall is extremely poor.The apps are atrocious. The majority of the apps available, including for roku, the worst of them, are very poorly functional. On roku you can only watch live - no access to your DVR, prior games, or even to fast forward or go back. Plain simple live is the ONLY option.If you use chromecast or other way to use the app on a phone or tablet, it is slightly better, but as you cast to tv, the fast forward and all other commands no longer function, unless you stop casting.Then comes the worst part of it - say you recorded a game, or want to watch a game that happened a few hours ago. First, you need phone or app - again, no roku functionality (they have been on beta for over one year). Second, good luck watching it all. The app saves what they think is an average time for the game, and if it is a bit longer, you miss the end. On football and baseball, you reliably lose the end of the game more often than not as they record only 3 hours!!!!Bottomline, barely useful, and only for live games.

title: EXTREMELY LOUSY CHANNEL, A RIP OFF!!
review: They really deserve a 1/4 star. The channel is a fraud. I paid the first month and am canceling soon. I could not watch ONE GAME without freezes and disconnecting. You have to reboot about every 5 to 10 minutes to get an image with movement. and of course, when you reboot a team made a goal and you missed it. I sent themÂ  on the very first day a complaint and somebody answered that due to the high demand of the games there were problems. HELLO!!! All the soccer games will be in high demand. My neighbor has Sling, costs more but it delivers everything flawlessly. Just in case I asked him to come over and hook up with sling and his password to see if I had problems with the my TV and NO, NO PROBLEM. The only problem that I have is how I got ripped off by these Futbotv thugs. I have complained 5 more times to NO REPLY from customer NO SERVICE. As you can notice I am VERY PISSED OFF!!!Â  i ASKED FOR A REFUND AND NO REPLY!!!! Don't be suckers like me, stay away from these amateur channel people. Not worth their weight in chicken feces!!!

title: From New England ? They got NESN !
review: My first complaint was going to be no profiles for family accounts but those have now been added so issue solved.The channel selection is decent for the price, especially with Fubo having nesn, unfortunately no no to watch . My only real complaint is the app does not work on mingle fire but then again many common apps don't either. The problem is when trying to watch it in browser (silk) you can't search for shows or anything for that matter, as soon as you hit search a pop-up comes up for a second asking to download the app and disappears and it continually does this .I really can't comment on buffering and such as the internet here isn't so good but I have had no worse issues than when I had Vue.

title: If I could give this zero stars, I would.
review: My husband subscribed to watch Racing: motorcycle, F1, etc.Â  We are both very tech savvy, but he found this interface to be very difficult to navigate.Â  We called to cancel, and were charged for 2 months. We realized this error when we got an âinsufficient fundâ notice from our CC company while trying to pay a bill. FUBO snuck through a $60 charge and caused us to be short of our payment by $20. Massive chain reaction of bullshit has been following us ever since... and, weâre on vacation trying to deal with all this. Not to mention the fact that all our money is in limbo, again, while on vacation.FUBO customer service is a joke. Everyone was 100% unhelpful. Took 3 reps to get a supervisor who reluctantly refunded one month.I highly recommend everyone avoids FUBO like the plague, and goes to watch live sporting events in a bar, like an adult.

title: There is not a SINGLE time where I've tried to watch a game that does not cut off completely and/or looks like its at SUPER LOW QUALITY
review: Fubo TV is a disaster!!!!I've had Fubo TV app on my Roku for about a year. There is not a SINGLE time where I've tried to watch a game that does not cut off completely and/or looks like its at SUPER LOW QUALITY.They are basically stealing your money away. The only reason why i've had it for so long its because I could not afford to have cable tv. But id rather save my money than watch crappy streamings. Every time I play a game i can watch about 25% of it because its quality is a disaster or it simply does not load up. beware, they will take your money and not provide a clear signal. UNACCEPTABLE!

title: 3+ Month LongÂ  Redundant Running Commercials Spoil the FuboTV Experience
review: Have had FuboTV for 6mos and I have no issues other than a few hiccups on streaming occasional. What they need to fix is their commercial programming. I have contacted them about having to watch & listen to the Dr. Dre Beats headphone commercial at every commercial break since January. The song being played is very annoying and having to hear it every 5 - 10 min is noxious at best. Their tech support weiner replied back quickly but said they have no control over the commercial programming I call B.S. as I checked multiple channels and that obnoxious commercial is being run on all of them. The next new commercial just arrived from Chili's. I won't buy Beat headphones and I won't go to Chili's just because you drive your message at me every 10min.

title: be highly skeptical of positive reviews-avoid this garbage
review: I signed on for trial to watch ALDS baseball only to find the games i wanted to watch weren't broadcast. Tried some of the programming which was basically over-the-air with commercials that I already get for free.Â  When I called to offer my feed back and get a refund they were totally unresponsive.Â  Heres the deal: product was not worth $60/month when you can get more way content from broadcast+hulu+prime+neflix+roku for $10 less a month, all I got was a sales pitch of cognitive dissonance. Totally clueless.Â  Avoid at all costs.

title: Stay AWAY from FuboTV!
review: The Fubo TV live is OK. I had several occasions where live shows (NBC) have issue with unsynchronized audio and video. I tested FUBO TV for 1.5 monts and decided that Hulu offers more for less money. After canceling my subscription (6/29) I immediately lost Fubo TV on my Roku device and LG TV. After 30min long technical support âhelpâ I was told that this is very well known issue between Roku and Fubo TV. This issue is not published anywhere so I could not know that 20 days of my subscription will be lost. Iâve asked for refund for my subscription that expires on 7/19 but Fubo TV agent told me that they do not have refund policy and that he cannot help me. So needless to say STAY AWAY from this company.

title: Cycling feed is lame
review: Yes you can SEE cycling but...First you may only see a video feed. But no audio at all. Or in some cases very poor quality.Second, the the menu system (at least on Roku) is a total mess. You cannot select cycling as your default. Thatâs at least two menu selections. When you do find the replays of cycling you then are faced with a chronological choice. No not reverse where the most recent is first. These are last.Obviosly Fumo is merely paying the least they can for the UCI feed and leaving it at that. Watching a 4 hour race with ABSOLUTELY NO AUDIO is nuts.No thank you. I will not sign up again.

title: It feels like a part time job using this thing
review: Miserable. All this thing will do is raise your cortisol. I have never felt hatred for an inanimate object before. It feels like a part time job using this thing. I feel like I should get a paycheck. It had made what is supposed to be a relaxing pastime a stressful headache. It's like paying for stress. The DVR function is useless because it won't show you an image when you rewind. You will end up missing a lot of your show or doing an exhausting rewind and fast forward dance trying to figure out where you were. It's exhausting and can ruin a sports event or show. If you try to watch a live program you will get constant "Hang Tight. We're looking for your video" and "Something Went wrong" messages. Its basically not a useable product. I have tried to use it with my Iphone8, 2018 MacBook Pro and Roku device. Get cable or an Apple T.V.. I don't know. Find another way. This has really made my life worse. It's just a bundle of stress.

title: The streaming was horrible. The picture kept pausing and skipping
review: The streaming was horrible. The picture kept pausing and skipping. I would record a program and then play it and it would skip a lot. Then, I would go to the network website and watch it from there and it played flawlessly. When I finally decided to end my subscription, I did so on their website, but got charged anyway. When I tried to find a number to call customer support, I looked everywhere, but did not find one. I cannot recommend this unless your are absolutely desperate to watch the Broncos on CBS. And you would have to be desperate to watch the Broncos this season.

title: FALSE ADVERTISING!
review: Advertised as having NFL Network and it said content wouldn't load , we wanted to set it to record a series on NFL Network and wouldn't record any of itÂ  called two timesÂ  first person said he could see it butÂ  would get engineers on it and call is back NO call back , called a second time she said it wasn't available we are extremely unhappy , my mom joined because dish does not have NFL right now and we are canceled due to false advertising and poor customer service!.

title: CRAP CRAP CRAP CRAP CRAP CRAP
review: CRAP CRAP CRAPCRAP CRAP CRAP!!!I would give it ZERO stars if I could.WHAT A WASTE OF MONEY FOR THE TOUR!!!Every time I try and watch replay the screen eventually freezes and starts over from the beginning of the stage. No clue as to when it will happen...but it happens everyday. The platform does not allow to fast forward or reverse. What a worthless website.NEVER AGAIN. I tried to contact them and NEVER got response. I have never been able to see an entire stage before it crashes.Do the world a favor and SHUT IT DOWN

title: Deceptive and fraudulent sales tactics
review: I tried the fubo tv service for a football game.Â  The reception was poor and cut in and out.Â  I cancelled the subscription the next day during the 7 day trial period and I verified that with a customer representative that the account was cancelled.Â  They charged me 3 months anyway and say I didn't cancel it.Â  They didn't send a reminder email before the 7 days elapsed as they advertise.Â  I want to report the fraudulent advertising.Â  I would not use this service or give them my card information again.Â  I have reported them to my credit card as well

title: CREDIT CARD FARM
review: Give them your credit card with this warning - they will bill you - whether you cancel or not.Â  My experience - cancelled same day I signed up.Â  Never watched 5 mins of their programming.Â  DID NOT have the programming around NFL they promised in marketing.Â  Despite this they charged me and fought all attempts to reverse the change.

title: Can be misleading to cancel; keep an eye on credit card charges
review: I cancelled (or at least thought i did) my Fubo TV service and noticed that months later i'm still being charged.Â  Researching the internet this appears to be a problem with Fubo.Â  Once you click the cancel button on your account page, a survey page pops up and then you have to click 'confirm cancellation' or your service will not be cancelled.Â  I'm positive I performed this step the first time I cancelled because I had to go back into my account a week later to confirm exactly when our service would be discontinued.Â  Unfortunately, I don't have confirmation from FUBO that I cancelled.Â  I've cancelled again and this time taken a screenshot verifying when my service will end.Â  I still have not recieved an email from FUBO confirming my cancellation.

title: Wanted to like this, but so far the interface makes it impossible to do so
review: When I try to use the channel guide, it only allows me to see a couple of hours into the future to see what is on or to record any show that I may want to see.Â  So far I can find no way to do it, and without that functionality I see no use for this service as it applies to me.Â  I will be cancelling if this is not possible to do.

title: Very good alternative for live sports and live local / national news
review: A great package for live sports and live, local / national news which is all I am willing to pay to see.Picture quality is very good.The offerings are very heavy on soccer unfortunately but there is a good selection for most other sportsThe most aggravating thing about it and the only strong negative is that some channels just randomly cut out while you are watching them - forcing you to click 'watch' agian and waiting for it to load.

title: FUBO IS FUBAR
review: This service/app is terrible.Â  The service streams multiple commercials consecutivelyÂ  during commercial breaks.Â  It may not sound that bad, but after seeing the same commercial four times in a row you'll think twice about Fubo.Â  I may come back and attach a video.Â  The app isn't much better, it's quite buggy, constant multi-stream errors when you're not streaming multiple streams.Â  The guide is poorly designed and buggy.

title: nothing but a scam
review: This service never worked for me, so I cancelled the same day I signed up for the "trial".If you cancel, make sure to check your credit card statement, as they decided to continue charging me for several months. When I contacted them for a refund, they refused. This is a bit of a pain as you then have to file a chargeback to get your money back.

title: Absolutly unreliable and Poor performance - Don't waste your money.
review: Unbelievably poor performance!! Paid account, simply spins and chokes all game long. At the end of the game it simple refuses to return from being paused. Lost almost the whole 4th quarter. Tried watching the recorded play after shutting down and restarting, clearing cache, tried other browsers, nothing worked. Finally i get it to about 20 minutes from the end of the game, and couldn't fast forward, couldn't move the slider. Then to beat everything, the game stopped recording before the end of the game.The teams wound up tying at the end of regulation. And the other team who was behind all game scored to tie. They went on to win the game, all of which i had to go to Youtube to find out what happened. I absolutely have NOT HAD ANY POSITIVE EXPERIENCE from this "Service"

title: Awful, possibly the worst streaming service available in the US
review: Got this for the World Cup, 2018. Absolutely awful service.Never had any problems streaming HD, I have a 100MB cable connection, Netflix, Amazon etc. all work great.Fubo however:-Constant steaming issues, pauses, blurs, complete crapouts-Doesn't work with my privacy VPN-Commercials on all the shows and films-Stupid expensive

title: CUSTOMER SERVICE: NON-EXISTENT
review: We got FuboTv so we could watch all the football games this season. The app was cool because it had so many different channels however, sometimes the games would cut out, or not have a clear picture, maybe because whatever signal was bad or something. That issue was the least of my worries though. My issue was when I tried to cancel, After cancelling 2 days before I was supposed to be billed again...I still got the money taken out of my account. I tried calling the two customer service numbers I could find, one is always a "busy" tone and the other is automated and no matter what option you select, it hangs up on you. I tried this four times and got hung up on each time. I emailed the customer service email from two emails and still have never received a response. HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE.....actually, NO customer service.

title: Beware of Marketing Fraud!
review: The service itself is fine.Â  Nothing better than any other streaming service, certainly not as good as Netflix.Â  However, the issue is with the fraudulent practices.Â  They offer free trials to their subscription for 7 days, but will charge your card on the seventh day.Â  Deep in their Terms of Service it states that you will be charge at the exact time of the renewal.Â  However, the customer account screen shows you can cancel anytime during the last day to avoid a monthly charge.Â  I did so, and received confirmation my free trial was canceled, only to have the charge appear on my card a few days later.Â  BUYER BEWARE!

title: Worst streaming service I've ever used
review: Worst streaming service I've ever used for watching cycling. The feed constantly buffers, for 5 min at a time whether live or replay.Â  And on the replay the feed always cuts off before the finish.Â  So I have to go to youtube to see what happened.Â  Paying $50 per month for this is unacceptable.Â  I cancelled my subscription and will never be back.Â  I'd rather read about the races online than deal with Fubo's horrible service.Â  I see bankruptcy in their future if they don't fix this.

title: Fubo stands for Financially Unstable Burglar Operation
review: I had Fubo for maybe 6 or 7 months. It was buggy, the stream would get choppy or freeze regularly, and I didnât have ESPN. Oh well, I thought. $45 a month is still worth it. That is, until receiving an additional $26 charge for no apparent reason that they refused to refund me. That is stealing so I cancelled my subscription and itâs doubtful that I will ever have any business with them ever again.

title: Fubotv keeps increasing tariffs despite of losing channels
review: I have had Fubotv over a year now, I made the decision to cancel my cable and chose Fubotv instead of Spectrum. It's so disappointing to see that in despite of losing important channels they keep increasing the tariffs.The price of a standard subscription is $60, only $5 less than the family bundle and 15 dollars more than Spectrum or any streaming service out there.If you are planning to subscribe now I wouldn't recommend it because the prices are way off.Shame on FuboTV for charging whatever they want. Nicolas

title: Zero customer service for log in
review: I would leave a better review but there is problems with my log in and no customer service to fix it.Â  Waited 3 hours on the phone, no answer.Â  Waited 48 hours for tech response to a ticket, still waiting and the link to chat is gone or non existent.Â  Service sucks if you canât get it

title: Stream Elsewhere!
review: Worst streaming service ever. Terrible streaming and service. Don' t waste your money on this 2nd rate streaming company. The stream reception is terrible, or you won't get the channels at all. Customer service is weak. They have 1 remedy for everything. I was streaming with roku. Beware !

title: Terrible quality
review: This was the worst live stream tv app/site that I have tried. As soon as we started watching it was very pixelated and jumpy and kept freezing. It did not stream clearly at all. After about 5 times of it stopping, saying that they were having technical difficulties, I cancelled my trial.

title: DEATH BY COMMERCIALS & CONSTANT BUFFERING!
review: Tried the free trial to watch the Tour de France and got totally BOMBARDED by awful commercials. What's the point of presumably paying for this service when all it shows is commercials with a few live teasers of the coverage? Also stream was constantly interrupted on a very reliable connection. Constant buffering. AVOID!

title: RUN AND DONT STOP
review: This is the worst streaming service I have ever used. I am getting charged for a subscription customer support has âcancelledâ several times. I also suddenly had a price increase up to $85 a month for no reason and it was after I had supposedly canceled my subscription myself. If I could give it less than 1 star I would. NEVER EVER USE FUBO AND NEVER TRY THE FREE TRIAL!!!

title: Poor quality signal, constantly buffering, confusing free trial set up, not customer friendly
review: Claimed it was a 7 day free trial, then attempted to bill my card for $74.99. Signal buffering was poor, picture broke up continuously. Could not follow what was on the screen. It's not what they advertise. I cancelled within the 7 day period, they acknowledged I did, and still tried to bill me for $74.99. Had to dispute the charge with credit card company.

title: $65 PER MONTH!
review: Why so much for something so terrible? I'd rather watch Crackle!

title: Substandard Service at a High Price with Even Worse Customer Service
review: Signal was horrible; there were some cases I couldn't even watch the shows I wanted to watch. And I have a 1 gigabit internet service. When I finally had enough and had missed enough shows, I decided to cancel through my AppleTV only to be bill once again because they allegedly didn't receive my cancellation request. And good luck getting a refund.

title: Pitiful Streaming Connection
review: The streaming is always low quality and choppy to the point of being unwatchable. I've tried using minimum quality settings, doubling my internet speed, watching recorded tv instead of live, and streaming from mobile devices, but nothing works. FuboTV is a good concept pathetically executed. Complete waste of time and money.

title: $200 DOWN THE DRAIN FOR SERVICE NEVER USED
review: DO NOT USE !!!!!!!!!!!! MY HUSBAND CALLED TO CANCEL AFTER DWNLOAD APP AND NEVER USED THE SERVICE .He was told it was cancelled. IT WAS NOT AND EVEN THOU THEY CAN SEE WE NEVER once used the app, they would not refund our money!!!!! TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE!!! Wish I would have listened to the other reviewers who had the same issue!

title: Buffering!
review: Spinning wheel, buffer, 240, 480, 720, spinning wheel, buffer, 240, 480, 720, spinning wheel, buffer, 240, 480, 720, spinning wheel, buffer, 240, 480, 720, spinning wheel, buffer, 240, 480, 720, spinning wheel, buffer, 240, 480, 720, spinning wheel, buffer, 240, 480, 720, spinning wheel, buffer, 240, 480, 720It's the only app I have that is never stable aka never works.

title: Not worth it, deceptive
review: Signed up for the 7 day trial and cancelled after the 1st day. Something happened with the browser on my phone while cancelling. I thought it went through and they charged me two more times. Not worth it at all

title: Wanted to like, but extremely disappointed
review: Low quality video. Also the feed keeps freezing making it unwatchable. I have 60meg/sec internet, and no issues with netflix, prime, espn and dishanywhere so this must be a fubotv issue.

title: Not a viable option
review: The stream routinely drops. The posted pic is from a recorded show. Live sports come with constant interruptions, buffering and poor picture quality.Â  If you enjoy poor quality for the same price as competitors that work, fubotv is for you.

title: TERRIBLE APPLICATION CONSTANTLY ASKING REGISTRATION
review: It always asks me to register my TV over and over again. The code option never works. I have to sign in with email and pwd which is really annoying. I am going back to HULU.

title: No refund policy, slow.
review: Download for kitten bowl. Had to refresh every 5 minutes or would time out, all other stream sites with my internet does not do this. Called day of pending payment and they would not refund me. There policy is a no refund policy. Terrible.

title: Spotty service. So frustrating.
review: Worked for one basketball game, but now Iâm spending more time trying to reset the app than I am actually watching my team. Going to cancel my paid subscription. Iâll be taking my money to another streaming option.

title: No heads up and no appreciation!!!
review: I didn't get any heads up about the change in channels and charges until today when changes take place... I will be cancelling my service that wasn't all the great to begin with!!!! We don't get any appreciation!!!

title: Scam
review: I signed up today at 7:30pm for a free trial to watch one soccer game and I watched 20 minutes and after that I wasn't able to go into the website nor app nothing. It's been an hour and still doesn't work. Make me think it's a scam trying to get cc information

title: Fubo is the worst
review: Terrible service. Never worked. Always froze. Sling worked for Women's World Cup every time, Fubo worked less than 10% of the time.

title: 7 MINUTES STRAIGHT OF THE SAME COMMERCIALS
review: I just had to sit through at least 7 minutes of commercials, nonstop, the same commercials!Â  This is beyond disgusting. I cancelled my membership immediately.

title: Fubo is a no go.
review: No customer service. Extremely difficult to cancel. Programming is mediocre. My experience with Fubo was a total waste. Did I mention no customer service.

title: Poor streaming experience
review: The worst steaming experience ever.Â  Terrible quality in trying to watch a live game that was being recorded simultaneously.Â  The recording would just speed up and slow down randomly.Â  Cannot fast forward more than 10 secs at a time.Â  Buyer beware!

title: Dont Bother if your a cable cutter
review: Hello, My name is Brian and I'm a cord cutter (all together " Hi Brian")Â  So I have no cable service any longer.Â  This App only works if you have a current contract for cable service.Â  not for nothing guys, if I had cable service I would not bother with Amazon Fire TV in the first place.Â  You need to learn you customer base, dont offer apps like this if your not able to deliver, or rewrite your agreements with the networks to allow access even if we have to pay a small fee.

title: Not worth the brainwashing ads!
review: We are trying to watch the olympics with the app and they show the same commercials in the same order over and over and over again, and about every 5 minutes! It is to the point of cruelty and torture, really. It makes me not want to watch anymore. They even interrupt the events!!Â  I don't ever want to buy or support Koch, eat McDonalds, use IHC, or watch Mamma Mia ever!!Â  The way they are forcing the ads is definitely having a negative effect that I am sure the sponsors did not intend and are not paying for.

title: An error has occured
review: All the time. I can't clear the error.In the past few days, I have uninstalled the app an reinstalled it numerous times... all in some combination of rebooting my Fire TV, deactivating my account, signing out of my NBC Sports account on my laptop and Chromebook and yelling at my TV.Short of resetting the Fire TV to the factory default (not ready to go nuclear to watch the Premier League without fake sound) there is nothing I can do to correct this problem.Â  I've wasted hours trying to fix an issue that is not mine.I have sent this same message and photos to support@nbcsports.com.Â  It is NBC's responsibility to develop an app that works, and it is Amazon's responsibility to offer and distribute products that are promised to work.

title: Disappointment.Â  Have to wait for HOURS for life stream to be over to watch it from the beginning.
review: Disappointment.Â  You can't watch live streams from the beginning, it starts playing from the actual moment you turned it on.Â  If you have to watch something you've missed you have to wait until the life stream is over and moved to the replay area.Â  Rewinding of the replays is not easy and precise, so I try to avoid using it.Â  You can't rewind through the commercials but that is expected.Â  You also will need an account with a cable company so if you are a cable cutter, you are out of luck.Â  Overall experience is quite disappointing and ruined the Olympic experience a bit.Â  No wonder Olympic tv ratings are very low.Â  A lot of people cut cable but NBC failed to provide a good alternative for watching it.Â  If I wasn't huge Olympics fan, I would just delete it and skipped on the games.

title: If you don't have cable...don't bother downloading this.
review: While the "app" itself is free, you still need to have a cable provider to use it. Which to me, defeats the entire purpose of streaming! If I'm going to have to keep a cable provider to use the apps...I'll just watch it on tv through my provider!Not what I was looking for at all. I got rid of cable because of the crazy fees they charge, so this app is useless to anyone who doesn't have cable.

title: Not Working on any of my Fire TV devices.
review: I have been using this app for over a year and about two or three weeks ago it has stopped working on any of my Fire TV devices. The app loads but all I get is a cryptic message "an error has occurred". I have tried every suggestion and nothing has worked.

title: Yes, you need to already have cable or TV....
review: Yes, you still have to already have cable/TV for this to be of any use, yet if you already have cable/TV then why would this be of any use.....??Â  I just don't understand how these stupid networks still don't get that1.Â  The internet is not a fad and it is not "the enemy".2.Â  There's millions of people out there that won't see your stupid commercials if you don't make it possible.Â  NBC finally got the hint and made the Super Bowl available, but not the Olympics...(?)Â  The only time I miss TV is for things like the Olympics, the Final Four, Super Bowl and Stanley Cup.3.Â  If you're selling commercials to companies and then excluding millions of viewers, you're not making as much money as you could selling "potential viewers" to your advertisers....4.Â  No, I don't expect everything to be free; I'm willing to pay something on pay per view basis so......... what's the problem, TV networks?Â  If I didn't know better I'd think TV was run by a bunch of rich, old white guys who don't even realize how out of touch with things they really are.Â  Reminds me of the time IBM sold a worthless computer program to a stupid kid named Bill Gates for $30,000...........

title: Absolute Crap
review: I'd like to write a review, except the app doesn't work... at all... on multiple FireTV devices and models. both the original model and 4k 2nd generation.It simply says:ERRORAn error has occurred.Even after clearing the cache and uninstalling and reinstalling, nada. Bupkis.What really pisses me off is that a quick online search reveals that this is a common problem that has been going on for close to a year. I want my money back for my Gold subscription.

title: Has not functioned since December
review: I've tried it at home, at work, at my parents house, and at friend's houses. It's not supposed to used the SSO for cable cable provider authentication, but I've tried using credentials from multiple providers anyway in case they were trying to make the switch.I've tried it on devices spanning three different generations of FireTV.It's not functional on ANYTHING. When you click open, you get the NBC logo with a spinning yellow circle for approx 1 second, then a message that says:ErrorAn error has occured.Options from that point are cancel or retry.This persists after clearing of cache and data, reinstalling the application, and even resetting the firestick to defaults.When you finally do get through to NBC support, they say they're working with Amazon to find the problem. That's the same thing they told me during the Boxing Day games, December 26th.UPDATE: This app still does not work. 7 months later the exact same error persists across all Amazon Fire TV devices.

title: Appalled at the fees involved in watching "our" USA olympic team.
review: Without paying the outdated and incredibly high cable fees, this was not really a good option for seeing the Olympics.Â  Appalled at the fees involved in watching "our" USA olympic team.Â  Or the number of commercials!!Â  This was so difficult that our family of 5 just stopped trying to see the Olympics.Â  In fact, it's likely there will be a whole generation of kids that miss out and therefore don't care about the Olympics, simply due to the greed involved in broadcasting them.Why do you need 20 different media channels for every event. Make it cheaper for your self, and make it available to the American public..... instead of trying to maximize every last penny you can out of every last show you put on.Â  Is there no corporate good for the public interest anymore. NBC and the Olympics have lost their way here.

title: If you're getting errors read this!Â  Poorly deployed app, but they have the monopoly...
review: If you're getting an error when opening the app, or loading content, you can't have any ad blockers active.Â  Bypass your PIHole, remove ad blockers from computer, whatever. That fixes the problem.As for the app, it sucks. The ads are as every 1-star review describes, constant, unrelenting, and repetitive. Hockey games aren't so bad, but the Olympics were terrible.Â  Needing a subscription is expected, but a cable account is ridiculous. Just give a non-cable cutter friend or family a few bucks and use their account. The app is slow and sluggish. Just have to deal with that.Â  I would say use every means necessary to circumvent the traditional "Pay us to watch, watch our advertising, and we'll black out what we want" mentality of the networks. There are lots of options out there. The sooner everyone ditches the status quo and hits their pocketbooks, the sooner they'll revamp the pay structure to get customers back.Cancel Netflix.

title: TERRIBLE
review: NBC sports and sports gold are terrible. It makes you re activate your device through your computer or phone multiple times which is a pain. You get your TV set up, then suddenly in a couple of weeks, you have to re activate.Â  That requires your computer and signing into NBC sports each time with a special code. And sometimes the announcer is drowned out by the road noise(cycling). The announcing staff is terrific for cycling. One other issue, I only care about one sport which I pay for(cycling) yet I have to continually pick that sport from a drop down of twenty sports even though you have to add them to your package if you want to view them. Another pain. In general I would state that NBC sports is not very consumer friendly.Â  If you have a problem you email someone and they send you a generic email in return that suggests they didn't read your email very carefully.

title: TERRIBLE OLYMPIC COVERAGE 2018
review: tthis has been the worst coverage of the Olympics ever!Â  I've been watching for 62 years and I should know.Â  I started taping the program about 25 years ago, and it used to be action packed.Â  It was all about the athletes and there sport and accomplishments.Â  Now they spend more time on themselves (the so called news readers)Â  I can't even call them journalists.Â  the show nothing but commercials (6-7) when they break.Â  And the segments that they do on each other is a joke.Â  How many times do I have to endure Johnny Weir and Tara discussing their frigging wardrobe.Â  I'm sorry but this is still a program that is ; or at least it used to be; seen by families with kids.Â  Don't you think they have some questions about Johnny wearing his lipstick nd rouge...not to mention the hair obsession.Â  You never know what your going to get when you tune to a NBS (SC) station.Â  I have yet to see one thing that is complete.Â  AND WHERE ARE THE MEDAL CEREMONIES????Â  Where is Bob Costas when you need him, and Mary.Â  The little skating lessons given by Scott Hamilton and Tahinan is just plain stupid.Â  If they continue this way I won't be watching again.Â  How sad!

title: Pointless
review: No useful content even when it does work. EPL has moved to Peacuck and that is not available on FireStick. Not sure who I should be more angry with NBC or Amazon. Both are fault. NBC won't get my business any more and Amazon is about to lose it.-Previous Review- They did finally do something to fix it after 2 months . . .Worked fine for months (and still does on one FireStick). Last week, I received the same error described by many others. Tried clearing, cache, then data, then uninstalling, then resetting Firestick to factory defaults. Got it to work for a few minutes. The installed other apps, and the error returned.

title: USELESS...unlesd
review: If I could give it no stars I would.Â  Totally USELESS, unless you have a cable/satellite subscription.Â  I have the amazon five tv stick and amazon prime membership to avoid the expensive and crooked cable companies!Â  This is just another greedy networks way of trying to stop us all from dumping cable.Â  Well get wise networks and amazon we would rather pay per channel than pay for all the crap we don't watch anyway so perhaps you should invest in bettet streaming choices than in your buddies cable and satellite.Â  No worries though they can keep playing their games and I will just keep not watching :)

title: So far it's useless
review: If you still have the NBC Gold app, keep it for awhile. For two weeks I've tried to watch a subscription *I paid for* and it wasn't available. I opened the "old" Gold app and there it was. And the old app remembered my so I didn't have to log in everytime. This one keeps making me authenticate. And as for authentication, how's this flow: scan a barcode, be taken to a website to enter a code, and what's that get you? A login screen. Why not just give me the login screen to begin with. And btw, that's not to say the Gold app was gold, it had plenty of issues, but I wanted to think they'd put some thought into a "new" app before asking customers to switch.Update: Edit to one star, this just gets worse and worse and they don't care.

title: Great if it works...
review: I installed the app, signed onto my service provider and everything was working great.The next time I tried to login, i just get the "Error An error has occurred" message and can't do anything.Â  I did everything that was recommended,Â  resetting the Fire TV Cube, clearing the data/cache, and fore stopping the App.Seems to be a consistent problem and the only known solution online is to do a hard reset on the device.Â  That is terrible.Â  Works fine on Playstation and Apple TV....

title: Useless app
review: This app is useless to me, as it repeatedly produces an error message that states that I do not have access to live streaming when I sign in using my cable provider (DirectTV).I want to use this app to watch Premier League soccer, but am unable to do so due to this major glitch/error in the system. Upon doing a google search, I found that many other people who have DirectTV also have this issue, with no resolution.I even considered buying the NBC Sports Gold Premier League subscription, only to learn that there are major restrictions on which games can be viewed. What a rip-off.Hey NBC, youâd make a lot more money if you actually took the time to learn what consumers actually want and need. Look at many of these reviews... Clearly Iâm not the only one who is unhappy.

title: Deserves 0 Stars
review: I gave NBC Sports one star for their Olympics Coverage because the system wouldn't accept 0 stars. NBC spends much more time on their sophomoric, platitudinous, saccharin-speak side bar stories, pushing their philosophical and ideological psychobabble, than they do on the Olympics, the athletes' actual Olympics' activities, and even the actual main events and performances themselves.Moreover, NBC is guilt of just the same sort of audience-abuse I remember from the last time they aired the Olympics. Saving prime events and prime performances NOT for Prime Time, but for very late in the night ... all the while while stringing their viewers along hour after hour with teasers saying so-and-so coming up, etc, without adding "in an hour or two".Â  5 Lemons for NBC!

title: Constant.Â  Buffering....Â  Unwatch...able....
review: Impossible to watch with all the freezing and buffering.I am hardwired via ethernet with a 50 mbps fiber connection (which usually tests closer to 60 mpbs) and the streams from this app are unwatchable making the app worthless.Â  I can stream the game on my tablet via my cable provider's app flawlessly and I can stream other apps on my fire tv without issue so there's no doubt it's the terrible NBC Sports app that is giving me trouble.Â  What can you expect for a free channel - what's that? Oh that's right, NBC Sports requires a costly cable subscription even for games streamed live OTA via antenna.Â  What can you expect for a paid channel?Â  Apparently nothing.

title: A WASTE OF TIME
review: I've tried over and over to view live sports broadcasts using this app on my Amazon Fire, but never been able to.Â  I receive their confirmation that my subscription is approved after activating the account and confirming my provider connection (Sling TV), but then wait forever for the screen to update as promised.Â  It never happens.Â  I've contacted them for assistance and spent countless fruitless minutes following their suggestions to complete the connection, but it never helps.Â  Even though I've received subscription confirmation numerous times, each attempt to view a live broadcast is rejected with the notice that I need to upgrade my subscription.Â  No information is given how to do that, and their technical support folks don't offer any such advice.

title: If I had a cable subscription I wouldn't use the app. For god's sake this is 2018.
review: Cord cutter here. I see an NFL game advertised on NBC. Great matchup. I download the app to watch the game. The app lets me watch approximately a half-hour's worth of pregame coverage before cutting out and telling me to enter my cable provider information. Holy Sh*t. What an absolutely ridiculous system you've come up with, NBC. If I had a cable subscription I wouldn't use the app, nor would I have Amazon Fire TV. Who is the marketing whiz who came up with this utterly boneheaded business plan? Jesus, just charge $5 a month for your app & let people buy your content a la carte. This is infuriating and worthless. Do you guys not want to make money? Your app is totally worthless and unnecessary and your business model is seriously flawed. Get with the times. Another disappointed customer...

title: Will this ever be fixed?
review: This NBC Sports app flat out does not work.Â  I have two firesticks and am holding onto a basic cable account just to use apps like this, and it has not worked for months!Â  You login, the screen never updates, you try every combination you can think of but you always end up getting this 'An error has occurred' message.Â  It 100% does not work, and neither Amazon nor NBC have any response or seem to care at all.Â  I am shocked at such a major network/product has this little effort or care for what would be a highly used app.Â  FYI, for golf events I've found ways to use the Internet browser and manually go to the video stream URL, which sometimes works, sometimes not.Â  Ended up buying a Roku just to avoid this frustration.

title: Have to re-register AND select cable provider EVERY TIME
review: This is the ONLY app I've found on Fire Stick that makes me re-register AND re-select my cable provider EVERY single day I use it. I'm not joking. I'm not exaggerating. Every single time. It is beyond annoying. I love watching skiing, bobsled, luge and skeleton, but I'm so tired of going through the steps that I just don't bother anymore.12/2/2020: Today I finally gave-up on this, and the standard NBC app. Wanted to watch the Baltimore-Pittsburgh game. Not only had to yet again connect to TV service provider, but then the app told it failed to load content. I'm done... Not worth the headache. Finally deleted both NBC apps.

title: An Error Has Occurred
review: I have been unable to load the app for two months.Â  Only receive âan error has occurredâ when I load the app on my fire stick.Â  I have tried restarting app and fire stick and signing out of other apps.Â  No solution available on multiple internet searches.Â  NBC needs to fix this.

title: YOU Have to have CABLE service to watch LIVE sports!!!!!
review: this is stupid, I bought the app so I could cancel my cable service ,Â  so I did all that and then first game I went to go watch they wanted me to log in with my cable user id and password. I called them and said I don't have cable anymore since this is the only channel I wanted to watch.Â  they told me that I would need it .... and it was over 24 hrs and I couldn't get a refund.Â  I said the lady said when I called I could watch 180 live gamesÂ  he said well there are more than 180 live games the rest you have to watch after 9pm on replay unless you have the user idÂ  make long story short after fighting with them for an hour they refunded me...

title: Hooray for Hockey
review: I needed this app to get hockey back! Overall, I love the app and have no complaints except it was excruciating to log in with my cable service. It took me about 45 minutes to log in with a code on my computer because my internet and cable are on two separate accounts and it kept defaulting to the wrong one. The NBC Sports website wasn't particularly responsive when it came to pairing my Fire TV either. Make sure you log in asap and not wait until a game is about to come on!

title: Failed to work on Amazon Fire Sticks
review: I was unable to get this to work on any of my Amazon fire tv sticks.Â  Got to the point where it wanted authorization from the web and after typing in the code from the tv, the web page stated it was successfully activated.Â  However the screen did not change on the tv (still showed the code) and now when I try to start the app it gives me an error.Â  Tried uninstalling and re-installing and on two different fire sticks with same results.Â  Frustrated so gave up.Â  App works fine on my phone.

title: Horrible implementation but the only app to watch the Olympics. :(
review: This app is the official app to watch the olympics but it's just so horrible.Â  When watching replays, you play the same two commercials over and over and over.Â  The commercials cut in before the results of a race are announced and when they end, the next race has already started.Â  It's a replay for crying out loud.Â  Put in the commercials BETWEEN races.Â  Why is that so hard?When trying to watch something the app says is "Live", it just sits saying Coverage to begin shortly and never does anything.The whole system is just bad bad bad.

title: Dont bother
review: Cuts to commercial about every two minutes.Â  This app is a colossal waste of my time.Â  Weâve had live streaming apps for several years now and this is what NBC lays before us?Â  Complete garbage.

title: Spoiler headings should be eliminated altogether like "Zlatan puts United ahead
review: Needs work. You can't fast forward or rewind streams using. When you try to fast forward, the app isn't recognizing the the button pressess on the remote. The app just starts blinking. Often it doesn't recognize the remote control at all. I use mostly for EPL replays, one, the location of highlights means you have to avert your eyes for spoilers. The titles are often spoilers. Replays should be a the top. Spoiler headings should be eliminated altogether like "Zlatan puts United ahead." Just title it "X v. Y highlights"Â  The exact same thing plagued the app during the olympics. Not that i care about olympics as this is about the app when it isn't Olympic mode. Sometimes a soccer game will resume where you left off sometimes it doesn't. There is no discernible pattern.A huge problem is often EPL soccer matches are not added to the app in a timely fashion. The game can end and it can be a day or two before it's available. Forcing you to illegal means to get the game shortly after it ends. Worse you can often log on on the phone and see that the game is actually listed for streaming.Note: I have the app on Roku too and it has the exact same issue as the layout is almost identical.Understand this:1. The app is requires you have a cable subscription. It is NOT a substitute cable service. It's not free.2. This is for the NBC Sports Channel (a cable teir sports channel) NOT broadcast NBC channel (the basic channel)

title: Terrible functionality. I would rather watch a less than legal stream
review: This app is terrible. I cannot find any way to turn on closed captioning. The playback controls are basically worthless. While watching the NHL West Final, I paused the game and intended to fast forward during the commercial break to catch up. Turns out it is impossible to rewind or fast forward. Ended up missing two goals when we went back to the live game.

title: A disorganized mess
review: Where do I start with a review of the NBC Sports app? It works, so that's a plus. There are many other apps out there for sports, but not any others which play NBC Sports, such as the Olympics. Other apps allow one to organize the offerings based on the league and date. There is no such organization with this one. Instead, you get a scrolling list of live events, a list of replayed events, and highlights. And NBC, which advertised that you can watch the Olympics anywhere and anytime, didn't bring this functionality to the Fire TV Stick. Not impressed.

title: Rip Off
review: NBC sports runs terribly during live events. They require you to have a paid subscription to watch half the events you follow under one sport wether you are linked to your cable provider or not. During live events the streaming tends to jitter and jump or just all out crash so you have to restart the app and go back to what you were watching. NBC butchered the streaming of Supercross, race times are always varying, sometimes you can watch the qualifiers and some races you canât, some races you have to have the paid subscription to watch live and some you donât. Itâs ridiculous. Thank you for ruining the one and only sporting even I follow each year.

title: Olympics on Fire TV Stick. Yes with this specific App. Here is how.
review: This works for Olympics on Fire TV Stick without a cable provider but watch the glitch. Each time the app reopens it toggles in the top left between the logo for this app, and the logo for the standard app which needs a cable account. Pay attention, ignore the other logo. I will add a pic if it goes through with this review.When you are in this app on this device there will be a row with hundreds of live or upcoming events. When the network is showing Olympics on NBC broadcast TV, a box for this will be in the mix of events. That mirrors the NBC broadcast, and will end as the network does. Look at the pic I will try to attach.The majority of the events are raw with no announcers or scoring, but is excellent quality, and some of the practices are shown as well.A similar App on Roku misbehaved badly for me.

title: Poor app
review: Absolutely a waste of time.Â  No search feature available to find events, backing to arrow throughÂ  is ridiculous. Beyond that, all you have is NBCs "highlights"Â  edit and worthless commentary; with more commercial length than actual event coverage.Â  I long for the days when ABC was the leader in sports coverage. Live events, factual and to the point auditories, and no political or broadcast politics. It has 1 star because I cannot rate it lower. In diving it would rate a failed dive.

title: Seriously?
review: What a scam. Gave me a 30 min preview then I needed to subscribe to channelvia paying them I guess?Plus, I turned channel off to save time for end of AFC game, but NO..30 Min preview timer continued to run whether I was watching or NOT!Oh NBC, you had your chance...C Ya

title: I can't get this app to work on my FireTV
review: Not sure what is going on with this app but I own it and I can't get it to run on my FireTv.Â  I get an error message saying "An Error Has Occurred". I have deleted the app and even brought my tv down to factory setting, wiped it clean and then started from scratch. The only app this happens to is the NBCSN app. It's frustrating and disappointing!

title: No Nascar Cup Series
review: Itâs a well laid out app with lots of content. Picture quality is excellent. I have it 3 stars because while itâs a great app, I couldnât access the channel/content that I wanted to. My tv provider is SlingTV and I have NBCSports in my package. The Sundayâs Nascar Race came on Sling but I missed it and forgot to record. On the Nascar page, they said that the race came on NBC and if I wanted to stream the race I could do so on the NBC app OR the NBCSports app. So I download NBCSports app and I enter my tv provider. The race is on there but I canât access it. It tells me there is an authentication error. I decide to try the NBCSports Track Pass because it appears that Iâll have access to all the Nascar stuff, including the Nascar Cup Series....but I donât. So I went thru all that just to try and watch the Nascar Cup Series Race and couldnât. I was very annoyed. The app really deserves 5 stars but thatâs why Iâm giving it 3.

title: Good App with bad policies
review: Ever since NBC decided to remove just about all winter sports from the basic app and requires the purchase of the Gold package I have no use for this app anymore. What a shame they felt the need to take this away after years of it being available even though I still need to login using my cable credentials and could watch it on cable when home. Unfortunately I'm not quite often in the winter.

title: Still really clunky
review: NBC have had a couple of seasons to fix this app but it's never any better.Â  It seems the design emphasis is on ensuring they have their money and have spent little effort on the usability.Â  The quality of the streaming has been very poor recently - I'm barely able to distinguish players/sportsmen is gets that fuzzy at times. Since I need this to watch EPL games I'm stuck with it - a monopoly NBC seem to count on.

title: Nice App While the "Trial" Lasted...
review: The App was fine until the hidden "trial" period was over. A detail that should have been mentioned before allowing people to get tied up. I find it unnerving that NBC would find it in their hearts, on Thanksgiving Day no less, to con people to get into this App just for the National Dog show. I guess NBC didn't save enough of their "Seinfeld" and "Friends" money to just be a pal and let us streaming folks watch the F#@king dog show!

title: So disapponted that this is being forced to watch coverage ...
review: So disapponted that this is being forced to watch coverage of the Winter Olympics.Â  We cut the cable but cannot get NBC over the air in our location.Â  So planning to watch this was squashed when you must have a paid TV service.Â  What happened to network television that has always been free.Â  Shame NBC.

title: Average App for Fire TV
review: Once up and running, the app is okay and provides what I need to watch the winter Olympics. However, it never loads the first time and always requires me to "retry" loading it. The tabs also do not load by themselves and require that I shut the app and reopen it to get a fresh listing. No issues with viewing video so it's not a huge deal, just an inconvenience. I should also add that I am using a fire TV or fire TV stick when using this app

title: OK for now; navigation/streaming quality could be better. Activation problem browser related.
review: I downloaded for Olympics coverage on my Fire TV Stick. Live events are easily found, but locating link to completed events can be a challenge because you have to scroll through as many as 300 events/highlights (so far) to find the one you want to seeâthere is no search tool. Quality of streaming is not outstanding, but most full events as well as excerpts of interviews and short features seem to be available if you look long/hard enough.As a side note, I initially had difficulty activating the app on my PC; clicking the "activate" link in my browser failed to go to my carrier's website, which was required for final activation. However, that seemed to be a browser issue. When I switched to another browser with extensions not loaded, activation went smoothly.

title: I wouldn't even give it one star if I could ...
review: I wouldn't even give it one star if I could.Â  This app requires you to have a cable TV service provider in order to view anything.Â  If you had cable, why would you need this app?Â  I have service on local channels through an antennae.Â  Don't they realize people can still view TV through an antennae and don't HAVE to have cable/satellite services?Â  UGH!

title: I onlywatch motor sports on this channel and am tired of ...
review: I only watch motor sports on this channel and am tired of the excessive ads and the poor graphics.Â  They continuously put advertising on the "ticker tape" standings bar and then start the ticker tape over again and you can't see what is going on in the back of the pack.Â  The commentators are incapable of tracking back markers that make significant progress during the race and only focus on the top 5 or so performers.Â  During the recent Bristol races the ads ran so long you missed significant parts of the race.Â  With all their camera coverage, they frequently can't adequately show incidents on the track.Also, they don't allow enough time for an event and change channels without any notification making it almost impossible to DVR anything.Â  I thought Fox Sports was bad, but NBC Sports is really terrible coverage and their arbitrarily changing channels is a huge hassle.

title: Dreadful in a Moment of Need
review: In a moment of need the App was dreadful. The App failed to load on a number of attempts. When it would load it would crash and go back to a spinning gear and ultimately not initiate. I am not sure if the network was completely overwhelmed. I do know it was not my internet access as other Apps and programs would load and work flawless.

title: Not a fan of this app
review: We watch alot of hockey.Â  Watching it on this app streaming through our Amazon Firestick is painful and frustrating.Â  The picture keeps skipping, buffering for 1 minute and coming back fuzzy.Â  The commercials are the same 6 ones and they cut to a commercial while the game is still on progress, not during a stoppage in play.Â  We keep having to force stop, clear the cache and start it up again only to find the game we were just watching is not listed.Â  Not at all user friendly.Â  Not impressed.

title: I have several streaming subscriptions and I wanted towatch a sports event not offered
review: Glitchy.Â  I have several streaming subscriptions and I wanted to watch a sports event not offered, so I downloaded the app for my Amazon Fire TV.Â  Bar none, this was the worst experience... many pauses in the show.Â  losing 5 - 20 seconds of content when it came back.Â  The screen quality was not as good as Hulu or Playstation Vue

title: Does not work unless you have a cable or satellite existing account
review: We tried to set this up as we have switched to streaming TV and dropped Direct TV now. We are using the Amazon Fire Stick 4K. When I try to set up this app, it will only set up if I input my existing cable or satellite provider. Since we cancelled this account to switch to streaming TV - this leaves us dead in the water unable to use NBC app.

title: where are the LIVE NHL SHARKS games? NOWHERE.... thats where.
review: I downloaded this app specifically for one purpose and one purpose only, to watch NHL Sharks Hockey... needless to say, we still havent been able to locate the NHL games (any of them) on the night they air, there are no NHL games in the "LIVE and Upcoming" and for highlights its usually the original six eastern conference teams they pick to show highlights...WHERE ARE MY SHARKS GAMES???this app sucks.

title: NBC sports not up to their usually high standards this time.
review: Worst olympics broadcast in decades. Commentators are often dull and deadpan. Coverage has been strange at times, even spoiling the outcomes just hours before they broadcast the event. I've come to expect much better from NBC but I've been let down this year. Bring back Scott Hamilton for figure skating and get rid of Johnny Weir(do). Weir makes it all about himself with his over the top gender bending attire. Need to look and act more professionally, Johnny. You had your time in the spotlight. Let the athletes be the center of attention now.

title: Football game issue
review: We were trying to watch a football game.Â  It worked fine, and then froze on a commercial or something.Â  We backed out of the app, and then restarted the game, but it went back to the beginning of the 1st quarter rather than the point at which we lost connection.Â  I do not have super high internet speed at this location, but I am able to stream the other internet apps just fine.Â  (Netflix, Prime, ...)

title: NBCSports App is heading in the wrong direction
review: Unlike a lot of reviewers, our household does have a cable subscription. This app - like ESPN's - has been paring away at what content is available to its subscribers. Rather than giving their customers what they're paying for, NBCSports has chosen to go the nickel and dime route. This is why people are cutting the cord. This is why revenue is down. The "we're losing money so we need to charge more for less" is the reason sports channels are hemorrhaging money. Paywalls for content that's already behind a paywall isn't going to win any fans. The writing is on the wall...

title: for the days when TV was good.
review: I've cut the cable because is it over-priced and nothing but commercials. Add to that the weekly Harry Potter, Lord of the Rings and Shawshank Redemption marathons (and Big Bang Theory 40 times a week) and you see the program providers do not care about their product but about how many dollars they can make from countless, mindless commercials. This gives me access to some sporting events I do want to watch.Oh, for the days when TV was good.

title: Horrible app
review: Thanks for nothing NBC Sports app! Your streaming capabilities are flat out awful. Trying to watch a game just now and it just buffers and skips the entire time. I checked other apps to make sure it wasn't an internet issue and sure enough it is your garbage stream. Is it so much to ask to watch my Celtics!! You should be embarrassed! A national network with a piss poor product. Get it together!!

title: Liked that the offered Superbowl 52 for free
review: Liked that the offered Superbowl 52 for free. Very disappointed with quality of the video stream. The plays were very blocky/lagged and the annoying interruptions that the presentation would resume momentarily were frustrating. It was almost as if they were hiding/overwriting commercials or covering for worse lag. Wish I would have watched it somewhere else. Hopefully they will do better with the Olympics, or I may have to setup an Over-The-Air antenna again (last one was destroyed by hurricane).

title: Cannot activate this app.
review: I dislike that I cannot activate this app. I contacted Amazon before I purchased Amazon Fire Tv stick to make sure I could use the NBCSN app so I could watch the NASCAR races. I was told by Amazon that yes it was included with Fire Tv. I cannot activate this app without an account number from my cable provider which is Dish Network. However, my cable is included in my rent. I called our resident services, they have no access to the cable account as it is a corporate account. They suggested I call dish network. Dish Network told me to call corporate. So again I contacted Amazon only to be told to contact NBC. I tried, to no avail. How do I activate NBCSN? I am an Amazon Prime member and the only reason I purchased the Amazon Fire Tv stick was for NBCSN.

title: Not happy. It would be nice to have clear app requirements & apps that actually work!
review: It never worked. Signing up for some of these apps is very misleading. Prior to downloading,Â  the app does not tell you before you download it that you must have cable or satellite or a membership to Hulu or any of the other server type apps in order for the apps to work.Â  So it's a waste of time to download then set up the account and then find out at the end of setting up the account that you need one of these other services in order for the app to work. Apps need to be more upfront with what's required before you do all the downloads.

title: Frequent verification and the interface needs work.
review: I downloaded the app 4 or 5 days ago and I've had to activate/verify 3 times now. I get that NBC/Universal (NOT Amazon) only provides content to those that pay for it (and you don't have to pay for it twice like with CBS All Access, which I'll NEVER use), but it is annoying that they can't trust that you've paid your bill in the last month, or in the very least, the last week. I downloaded the app to catch up on the Olympics. it's getting deleted as soon as they end.Also frustrating, the interface needs some work and the videos sometimes don't play and those kick you out of the app.

title: Worthless unless you are paying big bucks to your cable or satellite provider!
review: It's worthless.Â  They say:"Watch all of the 2016 Rio Olympics and thousands of live sporting events airing on NBC, NBCSN and Golf Channel LIVE with NBC Sports" - but only if you have cable or satellite.Â  So, I got basic cable from Comcast that includes NBC.Â  NOT GOOD ENOUGH!Â  You have to get a package that includes NBC Sports Network.Â  That isn't in any of the lower tier packages.Â  I can't even watch (live or recorded) programs that aired on NBC - like swimming and gymnastics.When is NBC going to wake up and offer streaming separate from cable or satellite?Â  Yes, I expect to pay for it.

title: Missed the end of a Double OT Playoff Game because of this app
review: For the most part, this app is all right, but there are some serious issues with the continuity of streaming. It has spells where the streaming is very choppy and blurry, and it is completely unwatchable. This is NOT due to internet connection, because I have switched to other streaming apps and had no issues. Most recently, I've been watch the Stanley Cup Playoffs on the app. In the Ottawa-Boston series, the game was in double overtime, and they took a commercial break. After the commercials were finished it showed the "coverage will resume shortly" graphic. When the broadcast finally resumed, the Bruins were celebrating the game-winning goal. Whether this was negligence or some issue with the stream, it is unacceptable.

title: Great..
review: Great...watched the entire Super Bowl on my Firestick without one second of "buffering" no skips, no delays and in HD. I've noticed a lot of negative reviews. There was mention of staring at the screen with a logo and the words something along the lines of "we'll be back in a moment". The first time it happened I thought that it was buffering; so not to miss anything I switched to cable TV and the game was not being played at that particular moment anyway. Those of you who have submitted negative reviews for this App should look for a problem with your setup, Not the App..... because as the old Chinese saying goes "sum ting wong"

title: Disappointed with access to golf channel.
review: Disappointed with access to programming available on the golf channel. Not able to watch other shows on the golf channel. Lesson with the pro,Feherty,and previous golf broadcast. Seems like they try an force you to upgrade to NBC Gold. Will probably delete and watch on cable.

title: glitches constantly
review: Constantly glitching. Would give a spinning wheel consistently about every 3-5 minutes and then cut to 3-5 min of commercials (presumably ones provided by the app, not the network, because it was the exact same commercials and it would often cut off what someone was actually saying on the livestream). Just horrible bugs that need to be worked out. Impossible to watch a live game. You're better off getting an antenna and standing at the window holding it for reception.

title: Weird- takes at least a couple presses of the select ...
review: Weird- takes at least a couple presses of the select key to start app- sometimes 3.Â  When watching I get the spinning wheel of death- never to regain consciousness- NBC Sports app want to go bye, bye now.Terrible- especially since my Vue, Amazon Prime, Netflix and whole assortment of other apps never have this issueI guess NBC offers a standalone programming service for a fee.Â  I wouldn't touch that sucker with a 10 foot pole based on this hunk of programming junk.BTW, as I write this, the NFL game I'm watching got the spinning circle of death- bye, bye.

title: Cannot get it to work with Amazon Firestick!
review: This channel works with our TV/ Roku. I can't get it to interface with or TV with the Amazon Firestick, keeps asking for our TV provider to proceed with the setup. We don't have a TV Provider. I have not found a way around that. The picture quality lags from time to time, and stays blurry 70% of the time. For a $75 Supercross subscription (5 months), so far I am extremely unimpressed. I will update this review if things turn around and get better.

title: ðWanted to Stream Stanley Cup ð
review: I wanted to stream the Stanley Cup Finals on my 4K FireStick, so I could watch the game in DolbyVision.NBC Sports App would not allow without a subscription, so this App was totally useless to me.I deleted the App, and watched the Stanley Cup Finals on NBC Broadcast ChannelÂ  via my Cable Provider.

title: This app keeps telling me I have to have a ...
review: This app keeps telling me I have to have a cable subscription. Maybe Iâm doing something wrong donât know? Anyway I abandon it. If I want to go watch sports I go to local eating plac this app keeps tell me I have to have a cable subscription. Maybe Iâm doing something wrong donât know? Anyway I abandon it. If I want to go watch sports I go to local eating Establishment to indulge in sports

title: AppÂ  doesnât work at!
review: This app is horrible.Â  It worked fine last night and now it doesnât work at all.Â  It says:ERRORAn error has occurredTried clearing the data, cache and even uninstalled and reinstalled the app. Still no go.Â  All I wanted to do was watch the baseball game.Â  Canât be at the stadium so I figured Iâd watch it on TV.Â  Very poor app and looking at other reviews this has been going on for a few years.

title: NFL? Not so much.
review: Due to NBC's issues I was unable to stream my local NFL game. In fact anytime that my team plays on NBC I will have to stream from my laptop and then go up to the TV from there. It's 2017, that's pretty terrible. I'll pick up an antenna so I don't have to deal with this again.The verbage when signing up explicitly states that I'll be able to watch sports that are on NBC and then denies it when I go in. I'm not on mobile, flat out ridiculous.

title: Ok in a pinch
review: I use this app to watch NASCAR when I am away from home. I think it's pointless to use if you are at home and have cable as you have to sign in using your cable/satellite providers information. I also don't like how when it goes to commercial you get a message stating that the race will resume shortly as this often causes the app to freeze. When you restart it, it automatically shows you another commercial and you miss part of the race. Plus be prepared to see the same commercial over and over again as they have about three that they rotate through.

title: What an awful SCAM 29 minutes into viewing the opening ...
review: What an awful SCAM 29 minutes into viewing the opening ceremony of the 2018 Winter Olympics the channel goes black and I spend the next 2 hours trying to figure out how to view the games. Ended up having to buy a $49.99 subscription to Hulu. What a manipulative scam NBC ruined my Friday Night!!!

title: I've rated this app poorly mostly due to terrible streaming performance
review: I've rated this app poorly mostly due to terrible streaming performance. How I came to use this app and my experience is as follows: I recently gave traditional cable the boot and have been using PlayStation VUE for TV service. The most recent NASCAR race was not available on the NBCSN channel but was available through this app. I was curious how well this app would work for a live sporting event and decided to give it a shot. I searched for the app via Fire TV's universal search and was able to find it with ease. Upon installation you have to go through an activation process that requires you to prove you have a cable, or similar, provider; this is not unlike many other pay tv channel applications. Once I completed activation, via a computer, the app was instantly accessible. The interface is sparse yet straightforward and I was able to quickly find the race and stream it. Unfortunately, it would stream for about 5 minutes then pause and show a buffering icon, there was no way to get the content to continue streaming without restarting. Upon restart everything worked properly again... ...for about five minutes and then everything froze. I repeated this process four times with the same result. My Fire TV's WiFi signal is listed as, "very good," and other streaming services I use (Netflix, PlayStation VUE) worked fine. I was excited to give this application a try, but don't see it as a viable option for watching live content at this point.Â  I plan to test it again at some point and see if the experience changes.

title: Too many commercials!
review: Very disappointed in this app.Â  Iâm a Spectrum TV Cable subscriber, but when I entered my credentials I received a message that NBC doesnât have a streaming agreement with Spectrum.Â  I used credentials from Cox Communications and was able to get the app to work. Then I find out that commercials interrupt the Olympic programming all too often, the app buffers a lot and when you switch to different events youâre forced to watch the same annoying commercial that youâve already seen 20 times only to discover that âthe coverage is completed âor a different event entirely. Terrible job NBC!Â  Makes me long for the days of ABCâs Wide World of Sports and Jim McKay.

title: This appp is progressively getting worse and worse
review: Previous version (prior to current 7.1) would not allow to access full archive for cycling content for the period of one year I am paying for in the form of Cycling Gold Pass.Current version that just updated on me only shows one month back... Completely useless.

title: Doesn't allow access to what you want
review: Pretty much a bust. Does not allow access to all the games on NBC Sports network.Â  I cut the cable for a reason as I'm sick of paying for what was once free air broadcast. I deleted the app. I REFUSE to pay to watch any of the NFL on cable or through an app.

title: 5 minute stupid countdown clock then no more views.
review: I couldn't watch the Olympics more than 5 minutes because they had a dumb countdown clock then we had to sign in using our provider and my provider is a dope "Frontier" and they don't help you sign in to a lost password in the middle of the night and the idea or calling customer service and being on hold for an hour... so I missed the Olympics.

title: Ok
review: Probably not NBC Sports for FIRE's fault, per se, but the repetition of limited commercials during the isolated Olympic events coverage was horrible. Also many events that were labeled "live" were "concluded". The extra annoyance there is that the commercial runsÂ  right off while the system seeks the event, only to be followed by the "event concluded" announcement anyway. I acquiesced to being happy to find a live event to that interested me and tried to ignore the ads, which btw do include political ads ð«

title: App hasnât worked since DEC 29,2019
review: The fire stick app for NBC Sports hasnât worked since Dec. 29,2019 and itâs Jan 15,2020. Too bad the Blues game is on NBC Sports tonight :(

title: Useless app on every platform
review: I've installed this lousy app on Fire TV, Xbox1 and Roku and it's terrible on all three.Â  It almost never works. On the Fire TV, I tried watching the opening ceremony but the picture froze up numerous times while the sound continued.Â  I just gave up after a while.Â  Most of the time on the firetv, it just says that it is "unable to play this asset".Â  I can't get it work on Roku at all.Â  I've watched two or three events on Xbox but once I'm finished with a program, I'm not able to watch anything else. Once I select an event to watch, the loading circle just turns and turns and turns but never actually shows anything.Â  If you select a particular sport, sometimes the content is there, sometime it's not.Also worth mentioning is that, in the opening ceremony anyway, the commercials aren't there but their allotted time still is.Â  In other words, instead of editing the show to remove the commercial time, they just put a screen shot showing the coverage will continue soon.Â  If they originally had 5 minutes of commercials, you still have to sit through 5 minutes of the stupid screen shot.Â  You can try to fast-forward through the blank space but I've had technical difficulties with that.Overall, NBC simply did a horrible job with this app.Â  The app itself had much potential but, unfortunately, is garbage and it seems that they didn't invest enough money in enough resources to broadcast the various events.

title: Good quality streams
review: Got this app to watch the Olympics.Pros: Good quality streams, good reliabilityCons: Stream times don't match any time zone that makes sense with my physical location, the location of the account, or the location of the stream.Â  Upcoming streams take time to update, so you miss early coverage.Â  App lags and mis-clicks often.Comment: Lots of stupid people seem to think this is a TV provider.Â  It is not.Â  It is an app that lets you watch content from your TV provider on whatever you plug it into.Â  You failing to read does not make the app bad.

title: Don't get fooled by the offerings...
review: Suckered me in with images of all things Philly: Eagles pre & post-games, Phillies actual games. Then once downloaded and signed up, everything disappeared except Manchester soccer! Nothing NFL or MLB. Nothing. Apparently, those of us who live so far out in the boonies who have no local "home" team can't watch anything in our own country? Sad.

title: total crap - just another money grab
review: uselessNow that everything seems to fall under the "pay more for" peacock or nbc sports gold, the cash grab is complete.There is essentially nothing you will see here that is not already on their 'basic' tv and streaming. Complete waste of time.

title: misleading - not what you think!
